Snapshot receives love on social media as Isha Ambani and Anand Piramal host event. Aadiya looks charming, Mukesh Ambani sports a stylish red jacket. Twins' first birthday celebrated with Bollywood stars.  Mukesh Ambani was recently spotted cherishing precious moments with his granddaughter, Aadiya Shakti. As Jamnagar shines in stylish fashion outfits of Bollywood celebs and other luminaries, Mukesh Ambani's grandfather moment is receiving huge love on social media. Amidst the ongoing pre-wedding ceremonies of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant, Mukesh Ambani stole a moment away from his hosting duties to share a delightful interaction with young Aadiya Shakti, daughter of Isha Ambani and Anand Piramal.A viral snapshot captured the duo in a candid embrace, with Mukesh Ambani enveloping his granddaughter affectionately. Aadiya, adorned in a charming cream ensemble decorated with playful tiger cub motifs, exuded an undeniable charm, while the grandfather sported a stylish red jacket over a crisp white shirt.Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's Day 1 Pre-Wedding Festivities Highlights: Rihanna, Mukesh-NitaLast November, Isha Ambani and Anand Piramal commemorated the first birthday of their twins with a lavish celebration attended by a constellation of Bollywood stars, including Shah Rukh Khan, Katrina Kaif, and Karan Johar, among others.The three-day-long pre-wedding festivities will conclude on March 3 with a ‘Hashtakar’ ceremony. Salman Khan, Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan Dance to 'Naatu Naatu' at Pre-Wedding Festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant - WATCH video | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodSalman Khan, Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan dance to 'Naatu Naatu' at pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant - WATCH videoTrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerSalman Khan, Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan dance to 'Naatu Naatu' at pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant - WATCH videoetimes.in / Updated: Mar 3, 2024, 07:40 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, Akshay Kumar, Aamir Khan, Ranveer Singh, Janhvi Kapoor and other B-town stars danced their heart out at the pre-wedding sangeet function of Anant and Radhika in Jamnagar on Saturday night!   The three-day wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant are just getting bigger and better! The Ambanis have hosted a three-day grand celebration in Jamnagar, Gujarat and all the stars have made their presence there. Right from Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, Aamir Khan to the Gen Z. The celebrations on Saturday night continued till wee hours and it was a starry affair indeed.Fans got to have a rare sight of Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan and Aamir Khan dancing together on the iconinc 'Oscar-winning' track 'Naatu Naatu'.While SRK and Salman were twinning in black, Aamir was seen in a green kurta. What was amazing was that the stars did the hook step of 'Naatu Naatu' but then did their own iconic dance steps.WATCH the video here:While Salman did his towel step from 'Jeene Ke Hai 4 Din', Shah Rukh and Aamir followed suit. Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding LIVE Updates: Salman Khan greets the groom, MS Dhoni, Ranveer Singh, ignores Arjun Kapoor  - The Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiTrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerAnant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding  LIVE Updates: Salman Khan greets the groom, MS Dhoni, Ranveer Singh, ignores Arjun KapoorCommentaryNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodAnant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding  LIVE Updates: Salman Khan greets the groom, MS Dhoni, Ranveer Singh, ignores Arjun KapoorTHE TIMES OF INDIA | Mar 03, 2024, 03:00:01 ISTShareFollow us Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding  LIVE Updates: Salman Khan greets the groom, MS Dhoni, Ranveer Singh, ignores Arjun KapoorThe much-anticipated wedding of the year kickstarted with pre-wedding festivity in Jamnagar. The youngest scion of billionaire Mukesh Ambani and Nita Ambani, is all set to get hitched with Radhika Merchant, daughter of Viren A Merchant and Shaila Viren Merchant. Friday night saw global sensation Rihanna take over the stage to belt out an electrifying performance. The dress code for Day One of the Ambani bash was ‘Elegant Cocktail’ and the guests were promised ‘An Evening in Everland’. Microsoft founder Bill Gates, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg and former US president Donald Trump’s daughter and advisor Ivanka Trump attended the festivity. While Bollywood celebrities like Abhishek Bachchan, Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan, Salman Khan, Akshay Kumar, Ajay Devgn, Saif Ali Khan, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone, Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, Karisma Kapoor, Ayan Mukerji, Aditya Roy Kapur, Ananya Panday, Sara Ali Kkhan and many others graced the functions. Indian cricketers like Sachin Tendulkar, M S Dhoni, Rohit Sharma, K L Rahul and Hardik and Krunal Pandya were also a part of the 1,000 member guest list. After Rihanna's act, buzz is that Arijit Singh, Hariharan, Diljit Dosanjh Sukhwinder Singh, Udit Narayan and Pritam will enthrall the guests on day two. Follow the ETimes blog for all the latest updates and behind-the-scene glimpses of the grand Ambani wedding.Read Less02:58 (IST) Mar 03Salman Khan greets Anant Ambani, MS Dhoni, Ranveer Singh, ignores Arjun Kapoor at the pre-wedding festivitiesOn the second of the pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant, Salman Khan finally made a grand appearance, accompanied with his bodyguard Shera. Salman exchanged greetings with former Indian cricket captain MS Dhoni and Ranveer Singh. However, keen-eyed netizens observed that Salman ignored Arjun Kapoor who was standing in close proximity to Dhoni.READ FULL STORY02:27 (IST) Mar 03Mukesh Ambani shares cute moment with Isha Ambani's daughter Aadiya ShaktiAmidst the ongoing pre-wedding ceremonies of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant, Mukesh Ambani stole a moment away from his hosting duties to share a delightful interaction with young Aadiya Shakti, daughter of Isha Ambani and Anand Piramal.READ FULL STORY01:42 (IST) Mar 03Soon-to-be parents Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh shine brightly on Day 2Soon-to-be parents Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone are currently in Jamnagar, Gujarat to attend the three-day pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant. On the second day of the celebrations, Deepika and Ranveer stole the show with their dazzling appearances.01:21 (IST) Mar 03Mark Zuckerberg, Sachin Tendulkar, Bill Gates, Rani Mukherji: Celebs shine in ethnic outfits to conclude day 2Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding celebrations are nearing the end of their stylish Day 2. The day commenced with a delightful jungle theme, and all the prominent figures were seen sporting unique outfits. Now, Rani Mukerji, Bill Gates, Melinda Gates, Saina Nehwal, Parupalli Kashyap, and others are attending the night party in stunning ethnic ensembles.READ FULL STORY01:08 (IST) Mar 03Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal greet Janhvi Kapoor and her rumoured boyfriend Shikhar PahariyaIn a video that surfaced online, Janhvi and Shikhar were seen basking in each other's company at the venue. Their bond was evident as they exchanged pleasantries. Their interaction coincided with the arrival of Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal, adding further excitement to the gala event.READ FULL STORY23:24 (IST) Mar 02Akash Ambani and Shloka Mehta's romantic moment steals heartsOn the second day of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding extravagant celebrations, the spotlight shifted to Mukesh Ambani and Nita Ambani's elder son, Akash Ambani and his wife Shloka Mehta, as they indulged in a romantic escapade amidst nature's embrace. Meanwhile, Isha Ambani, the ever-stylish scion of the Ambani dynasty, continued to mesmerize with her impeccable fashion choices.READ FULL STORY22:39 (IST) Mar 02Rashid Khan poses with Sidharth Malhotra, Kiara AdvaniOn Saturday, Afghanistan spinner Rashid Khan took to Instagram and shared a picture with B-town couple and actors Sidharth Malhotra and Kiara Advani. In the pictures, Sid and Rashid could be seen twinning in black tuxedo suits, while Kiara looked gorgeous in an all-black bodycon gown.22:25 (IST) Mar 02Mira Rajput poses with the Queen of Bhutan, Jetsun Pema WangchuckIn the picture, Mira exuded elegance in a white dress adorned with shimmering sleeves and intricate cut-out detailing. Standing beside her, the Queen of Bhutan, Jetsun Pema Wangchuck, radiated grace in a resplendent purple ensemble. Complementing their attire with statement jewelry, both women shared genuine smiles for the cameras, capturing a moment of charm and camaraderie.21:59 (IST) Mar 02Ranveer-Deepika, Vicky-Katrina, Shahid-Mira, Sachin Tendulkar: Celebs rock the jungle-themed outfits with the Ambani-Merchant family on Day 2The jungle fever theme of day two is creating excitement as Mukesh Ambani, Nita Ambani, Radhika Merchant, Anant Ambani, Vicky Kaushal, Katrina Kaif, Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone, Shahid Kapoor, Mira Rajput and Sachin Tendulkar gathered and posed in their own style. Radhika was seen wearing a blue dress with a leopard print and paired it with a similarly themed cap.READ FULL STORY21:35 (IST) Mar 02Isha Ambani delivers heartwarming speech at her brother Anant Ambani's pre-wedding bashIn a heartwarming moment during the inaugural day of her brother Anant Ambani's pre-wedding celebrations, Isha Ambani took center stage to deliver a sweet speech, expressing gratitude to the guests and sharing heartfelt sentiments as the Ambani family prepares to welcome Anant's bride-to-be Radhika Merchant.READ FULL STORY20:41 (IST) Mar 02Deepika Padukone stirs internet with bold 'boss lady' look for Day 2Deepika took to her Instagram account to share her new bossy off-white suit set outfit. The night party was attended by Rani Mukerji, Bill Gates, Melinda Gates, Saina Nehwal, Parupalli Kashyap, Mark Zuckerberg, Priscilla Chan, Sachin Tendulkar, Anjali Tendulkar, Sonali Bendre, Ivanka Trump, and Jared Kushner.  Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding celebrations are nearing the end of their stylish Day 2. The day commenced with a delightful jungle theme, and all the prominent figures were seen sporting unique outfits. Now, Rani Mukerji, Bill Gates, Melinda Gates, Saina Nehwal, Parupalli Kashyap, and others are attending the night party in stunning ethnic ensembles.The bride, Radhika Merchant, is embracing the night in a rainbow splash mini dress with a halterneck design. Rani Mukherji looked stunning in a red saree paired with a statement necklace. Mark Zuckerberg and Priscilla Chan graced the night in beige and green-themed ethnic attire. Sachin Tendulkar and Anjali Tendulkar were seen in black and golden sherwani and suit sets, respectively. Simultaneously, Sonali Bendre also looked elegant in a black and golden modern saree. Ivanka Trump was captivating in a gold and silver glittery saree, while Jared Kushner chose to wear a black sherwani. Ranveer Singh was looking stunning in a black and blue sherwani, while Deepika adorned a golden lehenga with fine jewelry. Gauri Khan also amazed everyone in a cream-golden saree.You can see the pictures here: The final party will be held in Jamnagar on March 3, featuring a 'Hastakshar' ceremony where everyone will wear traditional Indian attire. Salman Khan greets Anant Ambani, MS Dhoni, Ranveer Singh, ignores Arjun Kapoor at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodSalman Khan greets Anant Ambani, MS Dhoni, Ranveer Singh, ignores Arjun Kapoor at the pre-wedding festivitiesTrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerSalman Khan greets Anant Ambani, MS Dhoni, Ranveer Singh, ignores Arjun Kapoor at the pre-wedding festivitiesTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in /  Mar 3, 2024, 02:57 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us On the second of the pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant, Salman Khan finally made a grand appearance, accompanied with his bodyguard Shera. Salman exchanged greetings with former Indian cricket captain MS Dhoni and Ranveer Singh. However, keen-eyed netizens observed that Salman ignored Arjun Kapoor who was standing in close proximity to Dhoni.   Guests from all around the world are in Jamnagar, Gujarat to attend the pre-wedding festivities of Reliance Chairman Mukesh Ambani's youngest son, Anant Ambani who is set to tie the knot with industrialist Viren Merchant's daughter Radhika Merchant. On the second of the festivities, Salman Khan finally made a grand appearance, accompanied with his bodyguard Shera. In the video, Salman was seen donning a sleek black pathani suit, exuding his trademark charisma and style. As he congratulated the groom Anant Ambani and mingled with fellow celebrities at the vibrant 'Mela Rouge,' Salman exchanged greetings with former Indian cricket captain MS Dhoni and Ranveer Singh. However, keen-eyed netizens observed that despite the warm exchanges with other celebrities, Salman Khan appeared to overlook Arjun Kapoor, who was standing in close proximity to MS Dhoni.Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding extravaganza: Here's Jamnagar's take on the celebrity downpour in the cityAccording to the schedule, Day 2 of the pre-wedding festivities featured a blend of nature exploration and cultural immersion under the themes "A Walk to the Wild Side" and "A Potpourri of Desi Activities."First on the agenda was a visit to the Ambani family's animal rescue and rehabilitation center in Jamnagar, Gujarat. Guests were encouraged to dress in line with the theme of "Jungle Fever" for this wildlife adventure.Following the wildlife excursion, attendees will be escorted to 'Mela Rouge' for a vibrant array of traditional South Asian activities. The dress code for this segment is "South Asian Attires," promising a colorful and culturally rich experience for all participants.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Beyond the breaking news, we present a celebration of culture. Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding LIVE Updates: Pregnant Deepika Padukone dances with Ranveer Singh on 'Galla Goodiyaan': WATCH  - The Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiTrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerAnant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding  LIVE Updates: Pregnant Deepika Padukone dances with Ranveer Singh on 'Galla Goodiyaan': WATCHNews UpdatesNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodAnant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding  LIVE Updates: Pregnant Deepika Padukone dances with Ranveer Singh on 'Galla Goodiyaan': WATCHTHE TIMES OF INDIA | Mar 03, 2024, 10:05:58 ISTShareFollow us LIVE NOWAnant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding  LIVE Updates: Pregnant Deepika Padukone dances with Ranveer Singh on 'Galla Goodiyaan': WATCHAnand Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities in Janmnagar have kick-started on Friday. The three-day grand celebration included celebrities from all walks of life under one roof! While Friday night kick-started with a bang with none other than pop star Rihanna's performance, netizens call this event our very own MET Gala. Celebs from Amitabh Bachchan, Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan, Sachin Tendulkar, MS Dhoni Salman Khan, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Saif Ali Khan, Akshay Kumar, Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone, Katrina Kaif among, Varun Dhawan, Janhvi Kapoor among many others are in Jamnagar for this big event. Mark zuckerberg, Donald Trump's daughter Ivanka Trump have also arrived in Jamnagar. While this event is also a big treat for the fashion world and the excitement to see who wore what continues, there are some never-seen-before moments happening which have set a stir on the internet and how! Here's capturing all the moments and key events from this big bash, Stay tuned!Read LessKey EventsNews Updates 10:05 (IST) Mar 03Shah Rukh Khan along with Suhana Khan, Navya Nanda Kareena Kapoor Khan, Vicky Kaushal, Kiara Advani groove to Diljit Dosanjh's performance at Anant-Radhika's pre-wedding bash - WATCH vidoesREAD FULL STORY09:53 (IST) Mar 03Shah Rukh Khan, Suhana Khan along with Kareena Kapoor Khan dance as Diljit Dosanjh performs at the bash!The Ambanis' pre-wedding bash for Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant is the talk of the town and it just keeps getting better. On Saturday night, celebs had their party shoes on as they danced till wee hours and the atmosphere at the bash remained electrifying with various performances! Diljit Dosanjh performed and everyone had to join in to shake a leg. Shah Rukh Khan was seen on stage with daughter Suhana Khan and her friends including Ananya Panday. Kareena Kapoor Khan and Saif Ali Khan were also on stage to dance and Bebo indeed stole the show! The actress who looked stunning in a sequinned saree already seems to have great chemistry with Diljit as was evident in the first look of their new song from 'Crew'. Vicky Kaushal, Katrina Kaif, Kiara Advani, Sidharth Malhotra who were in the audience were also seen grooving to Diljit's performance.09:35 (IST) Mar 03Akshay Kumar adds spunk to the grand party as he sings 'Gore Naal Ishq' - WATCH        View this post on Instagram            A post shared by ETimes (@etimes) 08:50 (IST) Mar 03Pregnant Deepika Padukone dances with Ranveer Singh on 'Galla Goodiyaan', the couple plays 'dandiya' together at the Anant-Radhika pre-wedding bash, netizens react - WATCH VIDEOSDeepika Padukone danced on stage with Ranveer Singh and later was seen playing 'dandiya' with him at the after-party! The mom-to-be was glowing and made sure she was taking it slow while dancing but Ranveer won the internet as fans loved how he's taking care of his lady love and watching every step of hers.READ FULL STORY08:11 (IST) Mar 03Deepika Padukone grooves with Ranveer Singh on 'Galla Goodiyaan' - WATCH        View this post on Instagram            A post shared by ETimes (@etimes) 08:03 (IST) Mar 03Salman Khan, Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan dance to 'Naatu Naatu' at pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant - WATCH videoThe three-day wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant are just getting bigger and better! The Ambanis have hosted a three-day grand celebration in Jamnagar, Gujarat and all the stars have made their presence there. Right from Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, Aamir Khan to the Gen Z. The celebrations on Saturday night continued till wee hours and it was a starry affair indeed. While SRK and Salman were twinning in black, Aamir was seen in a green kurta. What was amazing was that the stars did the hook step of 'Naatu Naatu' but then did their own iconic dance steps.READ FULL STORYNo records available under this tabTop Stories Right NowEntertainmentAnant-Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding LIVE UpdatesEntertainmentMom-to-be Deepika dances with Ranveer: WATCHEntertainmentSRK, Salman, Aamir dance to Naatu Naatu at Ambani bash - Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-Wedding festivities: Day 2 unveils Wildlife Walks and Desi Delights | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodAnant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-Wedding estivities: Day 2 unveils Wildlife Walks and Desi DelightsTrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerAnant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-Wedding estivities: Day 2 unveils Wildlife Walks and Desi DelightsTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in /  Mar 2, 2024, 11:42 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding celebrations feature Rihanna's performance, a Cirque du Soleil show, and a drone show. Bollywood stars Shah Rukh Khan, Akshay Kumar, Aamir Khan, Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone, and Sidharth Malhotra are in attendance.  Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's three-day pre-wedding celebrations kicked off with excitement, including Rihanna's performance and a cool drone show. Day 2 might not be as flashy, but it's still going to be grand and classy.According to the schedule announced on Friday, Day 2 is themed as "a walk to the wild side" and "a potpourri of desi activities." Guests will begin the day by visiting the Ambanis' animal rescue and rehabilitation center in Jamnagar, Gujarat.The dress code for this event is 'jungle fever'.Earlier this week, Reliance Industries and the Reliance Foundation unveiled the Vantara (Star of the Forest) program. This initiative aims to address the needs of injured, abused, and endangered animals, both domestically in India and internationally.After the wildlife walk, guests will be guided to the 'Mela Rouge,' where a variety of traditional South Asian activities will unfold. The dress code for this part of the event is "South Asian attire."Guests from various parts of the globe have already gathered in Jamnagar, Gujarat, to join in the pre-wedding celebrations of Anant Ambani, the youngest son of businessman Mukesh Ambani. Anant is soon to marry Radhika Merchant, the daughter of industrialist Viren Merchant.On the first day of the three-day celebration, guests enjoyed "an evening in Everland," featuring a mesmerizing Cirque du Soleil performance and a show at Vantara. The festivities also included a spectacular drone show, marking Rihanna's debut performance in India. The evening concluded with a lavish dinner and an exciting after-party.The star-studded Bollywood guest list for the three-day gala included luminaries such as Shah Rukh Khan, Akshay Kumar, Aamir Khan, Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone, Sidharth Malhotra, Kiara Advani, Ananya Panday, Aditya Roy Kapur, Varun Dhawan, David Dhawan, Anil Kapoor, Sonam Kapoor, Shanaya Kapoor, Disha Patani, Riteish Deshmukh, Genelia, and Suniel Shetty, among many others.Rihanna steals the show at pre-wedding bash of Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant in JamnagarAbout the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Later, on Instagram, Zuckerberg congratulated the couple and expressed his love for Indian weddings, writing, "Love an Indian wedding. Congrats to Anant and Radhika!" Zuckerberg then shared another snapshot from the festivities' second day, capturing the couple's excitement for the event. In his caption, he noted, "It's getting wild out here."  Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg and his wife, Priscilla Chan, joined the star-studded pre-wedding celebrations of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant in Jamnagar on Friday. The event attracted a host of prominent figures from various domains.Later on Instagram, Zuckerberg extended his congratulations to the couple and expressed his fondness for Indian weddings.He wrote, "I love an Indian wedding. Congratulations to Anant and Radhika!".Mark Zuckerberg took to Instagram once again to share a new snapshot from the second day of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding celebrations. The photo captures him alongside his wife, Priscilla, exuding happiness as they prepare for the event. In his caption, Zuckerberg expressed his excitement, remarking, "It's getting wild out here."The opening day of the festivities, themed 'Evening in Everland', set a cultured tone with guests adorned in cocktail attire, elevating expectations for the following days. Now, on the second day, named 'A Walk on the Wildside', attendees are gearing up for 'Jungle Fever' attire.International pop star Rihanna electrified the pre-wedding celebrations on Friday with an amazing performance, marking her debut appearance in India. Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding Speech: Radhika Merchant expresses her love for Anant and gratitude towards the Ambani family in her pre-wedding speech | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomelifestylerelationshiphealth & fitnessstylevisual storiestrendingparentingthe artssoul searchbeautybooksrecipesfood newstravelhome & gardeneventsspotlightvideoslove & sexworkpetssoul curryask the expertvideosNewslifestylerelationshipslove-sexRadhika Merchant recalls when she and Anant Ambani were locked down in Jamnagar during Covid-19TrendingAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownManish MalhotraBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone RoutineAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownManish MalhotraBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone RoutineAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownManish MalhotraBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone RoutineRadhika Merchant recalls when she and Anant Ambani were locked down in Jamnagar during Covid-19TOI Lifestyle Desk / TIMESOFINDIA.COM /  Mar 2, 2024, 23:55 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us Radhika Merchant expressed love and gratitude for the Ambani family. She shared her deep connection with Jamnagar and her love for Anant Ambani. Radhika witnessed the birth of a baby elephant and praised Anant's project Vantara. They are excited for their wedding in Jamnagar. Radhika Merchant and Anant Ambani  On Day 1 of their lavish three-day pre-wedding celebrations in Jamnagar, to-be bride and Ambani bahu, Radhika Merchant expressed her love and gratitude for all members of the Ambani family. While she called Nita Ambani an inspiration, she shared that Mukesh Ambani is a father-figure to her. Moreover, she also shared her love for Anant Ambani-- her life-partner and how they build their relationship over the years in Jamnagar.Radhika Merchant said, "For Anant and me, Jamnagar is where our heart is. This is where we grew-up, where we became friends, where we fell in love, and where we built our relationship. Now as we begin our future together, we will be doing it here, and we are so thankful when you get to see the beginning of it. This place has become a part of our fondest memories, my deepest secrets, our loudest laughs, and the happiest times that we have had together as a family. It has seen us go through all our ups and downs."Sharing a lesser-known detail about their relationship, Radhika further said, "In March of 2020, Anant and I got locked down here and we couldn't go back to see our families for months. Although it was hard to stay away, we learnt to appreciate the small joys of life. But in Jamnagar, and with Anant, the small joys are a once in a lifetime experiences. One day we got a call saying one of our rescued elephants was giving birth. Since she was brought up in captivity she was extremely stressed by the process. I watched as Anant stood there with the mahavat, through an eight-hour labour process, calmly talking to her. Now we have a beautiful baby Hanuman, who is almost four-years-old and is as naughty as ever."Talking about Anant's ambitious project Vantara and how she has seen it shape over the years, Radhika said, "People ask me when did Anant start Vantara? I don't think there is any start date. It has always just been in his heart. He has been able to formalise this institution more over the years. I have had the privilege of watching Anant and his team pour their hearts and souls into making this vision a reality. Anant, I will never be able to express how proud I am of you."Radhika then expressed her love for Anant, whom she is all set to marry on July 12, 2024. Talking of love and marriage, Radhika said, "Someone once told me what do you really find when you find a partner. What you really find is somebody to witness your life. There are over a billion people on this Earth and what does one life really mean? But when you find somebody, you find somebody to promise you to care about everything-- the good, the bad, the beautiful, the bold, the sad, and the mundane. You say, 'I will see you everyday. Your life will not go unnoticed because I will witness it'. Anant, I am so blessed to be a witness to your beautiful life." She added, "Anant and I are so blessed to have you here in Jamnagar. It is an example of how expansive the Indian industry could be, how expansive a human heart can be. Anant's grandfather, Shri Dhirubhai Ambani, dreamt of opening the world's largest refinery here, Mukesh uncle executed this dream with precision, and Nita aunty built a vibrant township and a green belt which was once a barren land. This gave Anant the world's greatest canvas to fulfil his passions. Three generations of our family have worked together and dedicated themselves to Jamnagar, and we feel so humbled to be able to share it with you all today. Thank you once again for being a part of our celebrations. I hope the grace, beauty and magic of Vantara touches your hearts like it has ours."Anant and Radhika formally got engaged in January 2023, after knowing each other for a few years. Radhika Merchant is the youngest daughter of Encore Pharmaceuticals' CEO Viren Merchant and his wife Shaila Merchant. I hope the grace, beauty and magic of Vantara touches your hearts like it has ours."Anant and Radhika formally got engaged in January 2023, after knowing each other for a few years. Radhika Merchant is the youngest daughter of Encore Pharmaceuticals' CEO Viren Merchant and his wife Shaila Merchant.Amitabh Bachchan, Manushi Chhillar and other celebs flock to Anant Ambani and Radhika's pre-wedding gala in Gujarat's JamnagarAbout the AuthorTOI Lifestyle DeskThe TOI Lifestyle Desk is a dynamic team of dedicated journalists who, with unwavering passion and commitment, sift through the pulse of the nation to curate a vibrant tapestry of lifestyle news for The Times of India readers. Anant Ambani, Radhika Merchant Signing Ceremony, Hastakshar at Temple: All About It | - Times of India Sign InTOIVideosCityMetro CitiesmumbaidelhibengaluruHyderabadkolkatachennaiOther  regionmysurunagpurnashiknavi mumbainoidapatnapuducherrypuneraipurrajkotranchithanesalemshillongshimlasrinagarsurattrichythiruvananthapuramudaipurvadodaravaranasivijayawadavisakhapatnamphotosWeb StoriesIndiafeaturedAyodhya Ram TempleSaving Our StripesTimes EvokeMaharashtraDelhiKarnatakaTamil NaduTelanganaUttar PradeshWest BengalGujaratMadhya PradeshBiharChandigarhRajasthanArunachal PradeshAndhra PradeshAssamChhattisgarhGoaHaryanaHimachal PradeshJammu KashmirJharkhandKeralaManipurMeghalayaMizoramNagalandOdishaPunjabSikkimTripuraUttarakhandAndaman Nicobar IslandsDadra Nagar HaveliDaman DiuLakshadweepPondicherryWeb StoriesWorldBusinessTechCricketSportsEntertainmentAutoTVWeb SeriesLife & StyleEducationPhotosBlogsNewsAnant Ambani, Radhika Merchant to have a signing ceremony, Hastakshar, at temple: All about itAnant Ambani, Radhika Merchant to have a signing ceremony, Hastakshar, at temple: All about itTOI Lifestyle Desk / etimes.in /  Mar 2, 2024, 17:38 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us The gala pre-wedding festivity of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant has gained global attention. The three-day event will witness global leaders and a Hastakshar ceremony in 'heritage Indian attire'. The event includes Nita Ambani's vision of preserving Indian tradition, various performances, and activities for guests in South Asian attire. Read the article to know more.  The gala pre-wedding festivity of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant has gained global attention for accommodating Indian culture in the finest and elegant way. The three-day event will witness global leaders from across the world.While the entire event has been meticulously planned to fit every aspect of Indian tradition, culture and specifically the legacy of the Ambanis, an interesting part of the event will be held during the grand finale.As per reports, the Ambani household will conduct a Hastakshar ceremony for the soon-to-be married couple. For this event, the guests are supposed to be dressed in 'heritage Indian attire'. On the last day, there will be a outdoor event as well; named 'Tusker Trails', this is an outdoor affair where guests can enjoy Jamnagar's natural beauty.What is hastakshar ceremony?As per reports, hastakshar or the signing ceremony will be done by the couple in presence of the guests. The event will be held at Jamnagar Township Temple complex. The event, which will be held in the temple, will be graced by the guests in traditional Indian attire.14 new temples were built in Jamnagar, Gujarat recently. Envisioned by Nita Ambani to preseve the rich tradition of India, the temple complex boasts intricately carved pillars, incredible sculptures of gods and goddesses, fresco-style paintings, and architecture inspired by generations of artistic heritage.The first day of three-day gala involved “an evening in Everland,” a Cirque du Soleil performance, a show at Vantara, and a drone show. Rihanna's first-ever performance in India was an extraordinary part of the first day event. The event included dinner, and an after party.On the second day of the celebration 'A Walk on the Wildside' was held outdoors at the Ambanis' animal rescue and rehabilitation centre in Jamnagar, Gujarat. After this, the guests were escorted to 'Mela Rouge' where a potpourri of desi activities will take place. The dress code for the guests for this event is South Asian attire.Amitabh Bachchan, Manushi Chhillar and other celebs flock to Anant Ambani and Radhika's pre-wedding gala in Gujarat's JamnagarAbout the AuthorTOI Lifestyle DeskThe TOI Lifestyle Desk is a dynamic team of dedicated journalists who, with unwavering passion and commitment, sift through the pulse of the nation to curate a vibrant tapestry of lifestyle news for The Times of India readers. As anticipation mounts for Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding celebrations, Bollywood stars are stealing the spotlight with their fashion choices. Leading the trendsetters are Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh, and Kiara Advani, who have already sparked a fever on social media. As the festivities unfold, more inside glimpses are surfacing, captivating audiences with each glamorous costume.Now, taking to Instagram stories, Rhea Kapoor shared a beautiful picture of Alia Bhatt.Praising her look, Rhea captioned, "This girl @aliaabhatt". Alia looks lovely in a midnight blue velvet gown with a plunging neckline. She looks stunning in a midnight blue velvet gown, accentuated by a plunging neckline.Recently, photos of Ranbir Kapoor and Alia with their daughter Raha surfaced on the internet, sparking excitement among fans. An unseen picture featuring Ranbir, Alia, Raha, and Ayan Mukerji circulated on social media, showing them enjoying a delightful moment in what appears to be a luxurious garden.The viral image captures Ranbir in casually suave attire, sporting black shorts paired with a vibrant red t-shirt. With a cap resting effortlessly on his head and sunglasses adding a touch of mystery. Meanwhile, Alia is seen in a knee-length blue dress, radiating elegance. On the other hand, Ayan opts for a chic white ensemble.The pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant have taken the town by storm, drawing attention from all corners. With the attendance of leading Bollywood celebrities and international sensations, the event has reached remarkable levels of brilliance. Jamnagar Airport was granted international status for ten days amidst lavish pre-wedding celebrations by Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant.As the opulent pre-wedding festivities for Indian billionaire Mukesh Ambani's youngest son, Anant, and his fiancée Radhika Merchant unfold in the vibrant state of Gujarat, a noteworthy development has taken place at Jamnagar Airport.In a strategic move, the Indian Air Force (IAF) has accorded international status to Jamnagar Airport for ten days, marking a significant milestone in the region's aviation landscape.Effective March 1, 2024, this temporary international status allows the airport to play a pivotal role in accommodating the high-profile guests arriving to partake in the grand celebrations.The IAF has not only granted international status but has also granted access to the airport's sensitive technical area, showcasing a collaborative effort to facilitate the smooth execution of the events surrounding Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities.Recognizing the unique demands of hosting an international event, the government has allocated resources for the establishment of a dedicated customs, immigration, Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's Pre-Wedding Festivities in Gujarat | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomelifestylerelationshiphealth & fitnessstylevisual storiestrendingparentingthe artssoul searchbeautybooksrecipesfood newstravelhome & gardeneventsspotlightvideosceleb stylestyle guidebuzzdesignersshowstimes luxuryvideosdesigner directoryNewslifestylefashionceleb-styleAnant-Radhika pre wedding: Bride-to-be Radhika Merchant looks breathtaking in a custom-made Versace gownTrendingAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownManish MalhotraBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone RoutineAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownManish MalhotraBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone RoutineAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownManish MalhotraBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone RoutineAnant-Radhika pre wedding: Bride-to-be Radhika Merchant looks breathtaking in a custom-made Versace gownTOI Lifestyle Desk / etimes.in /  Mar 2, 2024, 09:44 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us The pre-wedding festivities for Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant in Gujarat included a cocktail night where Radhika dazzled in a pink Versace dress. It was a museum-worthy custom haute couture piece that was made previously for Blake Lively to co-chair the Met Gala.   The pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant are in full swing in Gujarat, as the deeply-in-love couple gears up for their anticipated wedding in July 2024. Ahead of the big day, the Ambani and Merchant families organized a grand three-day celebration for the soon-to-be-married duo, with highlights from the cocktail night flooding the internet.Let's take a closer look at Radhika Merchant's captivating ensemble for her cocktail night, a sight to behold.On March 1, 2024, Radhika Merchant dazzled in a pink off-shoulder dress from the renowned fashion house, Versace. The custom haute couture piece boasted vibrant embellishments throughout, with delicate lace detailing near the waist adding a touch of elegance. Interestingly, this dress bore resemblance to the one worn by American actress Blake Lively for her iconic 2022 Met Gala appearance. However, Radhika opted out of the matching-hued gloves and extravagant train, keeping her look sleek and modern.Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding fiesta: Rihanna's 'Diamonds' rehearsal video takes internet by stormAccessorizing her custom-made Versace attire, Anant Ambani's fiancée adorned herself with diamond jewelry. She opted for a distinctive necklace adorned with yellow stones, complemented by a sleek bracelet and heart-shaped earrings. Radhika's makeup exuded glamour, featuring blushed and highlighted cheeks, glossy nude lipstick, glittery eyeshadow, precise eyeliner, and defined brows. Her side-parted hair cascaded in soft curls, adding a charming touch to her overall appearance.In additional glimpses from the cocktail night, Radhika was seen delivering a speech on stage alongside her fiancé, Anant. Later, she shared a sweet moment with her future mother-in-law, Nita Ambani, receiving a tender kiss of affection. Subsequently, candid snapshots from inside the party captured Radhika and Nita sharing joyful moments, exemplifying pure family warmth. Notably, Nita herself looked stunning in a purple gown, radiating elegance and grace alongside the glowing bride-to-be.About the AuthorTOI Lifestyle DeskThe TOI Lifestyle Desk is a dynamic team of dedicated journalists who, with unwavering passion and commitment, sift through the pulse of the nation to curate a vibrant tapestry of lifestyle news for The Times of India readers. At the TOI Lifestyle Desk, we go beyond the obvious, delving into the extraordinary. Consider us your lifestyle companion, providing a daily dose of inspiration and information. From Mukesh Ambani's welcome speech, Anant Ambani's dapper look to Shibani Dandekar's performance: Inside photos from Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's starry cocktail night | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodFrom Mukesh Ambani's welcome speech, Anant Ambani's dapper look to Shibani Dandekar's performance: Inside photos from Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's starry cocktail nightTrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerFrom Mukesh Ambani's welcome speech, Anant Ambani's dapper look to Shibani Dandekar's performance: Inside photos from Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's starry cocktail nightTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Mar 2, 2024, 01:41 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities are taking place in their ancestral residence in Jamnagar, Gujarat. The first day included a cocktail party with a welcome speech by Mukesh Ambani and a performance by Shibani Dandekar. Photos show Anant's dapper look and a glimpse of the cocktail bash. Akash Ambani was spotted enjoying the evening festivities and looked stylish.  Ahead of their grand wedding in July, Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities have been taking place in their ancestral residence in Jamnagar, Gujarat. The first day of their pre-wedding bash on march 1 was a cocktail party.From Mukesh Ambani's welcome speech, Anant Ambani's dapper look to Shibani Dandekar's performance, take a look at some inside photos from the starry cocktail night.Check out the photos here:A fan page dedicated to the Ambani family recently unveiled the first glimpse of Anant at his cocktail bash. The young man exuded pure joy, beaming from ear to ear. For the occasion, he opted for a formal attire, wearing a black blazer paired with a crisp white shirt. A sleek diamond brooch, a neatly gelled hairdo, and his infectious smile enhanced his overall look, adding a touch of charm and elegance.Akash Ambani was spotted enjoying the evening festivities with some guests and dignitaries. Following the formal dress code, Akash looked stylish in a red and black velvet blazer worn over a black formal shirt. He completed his look with black trousers and formal shoes.Mukesh Ambani was seen thoroughly enjoying his son Anant Ambani's cocktail bash. As the patriarch of the family, his pride in witnessing his youngest son's journey to matrimony was evident in his radiant smile. For the occasion, Mukesh Ambani donned a formal black suit, accentuated by a stylish red pocket square, adding a touch of sophistication to his attire.See More: Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding LIVE Updates: Aamir Khan sends his blessings to the soon-to-be married coupleA particularly enchanting moment of the evening was captured in a recent video circulating on social media, featuring Shibani Akhtar captivating the audience with her mesmerizing voice.While the grand decor of the spacious hall, adorned with regal chandeliers and other ornate props, was undeniably captivating, it was the heartfelt speech delivered by Mukesh Ambani that truly stole the show and touched hearts.Joined by the crème dela crème of the world's best businessmen, artists, sports persons and celebrities from the film industry, Ambani started his speech by thanking all the guests for indulging in the festivities.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Beyond the breaking news, we present a celebration of culture. She stuns in bossy off-white suit set outfit for Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding ceremony. Ranveer Singh rocks white suit. Kareena Kapoor Khan, Alia Bhatt, Sonam Kapoor share pictures from cocktail party in Jamnagar, Gujarat.  Deepika Padukone has recently surprised her fans with an announcement that she is expecting a child in September. Now, the actress is setting the internet on fire with her stunning outfits from the pre-wedding ceremony of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant. Deepika took to her Instagram account to share her new bossy off-white suit set outfit. The actress was seen exuding bold poses in a long lightweight jacket and wide-leg pants; she paired it with tan cool high heels and cool black shades. check out the pictures here:On March 1, Deepika took to her Instagram account to reveal her first-day outfit for the pre-wedding ceremony with Ranveer Singh. She was running the internet jealous in a simple black princess dress with a contrasting green necklace. At the same time, Ranveer chose to wear a white suit and blazer with his signature black shades.Deepika Padukone & Ranveer Singh get mobbed in Jamnagar | Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-weddingKareena Kapoor Khan, Alia Bhatt, Sonam Kapoor, and more are taking to their social media accounts to share pictures from the last night cocktail party, and the internet is eagerly waiting for their day 2 outfit. The three-day long pre-wedding ceremonies will end on March 3 with a 'Hastakshar' party in Jamnagar, Gujarat.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Kashi TempleWomen Trafficking MaharashtraNoida Student Murder CaseAjaya Krishna VishveshaShahjahan Sheikh arrestBengaluru blasts: Who are owners of Rameshwaram Cafe, who catered Radhika-Anant Ambani's pre-wedding celebrationTOI City Desk / TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Updated: Mar 2, 2024, 17:45 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us  In the Bengaluru, the cafe has four outlets — at Whitefield, Rajajinagar, JP Nagar, and Indiranagar BENGALURU: Nine people were injured, three of them seriously, when a timer-operated bomb planted at a popular quick-service restaurant in Bengaluru’s tech corridor exploded on Friday afternoon.Karnataka chief minister Siddaramaiah called it a “low-intensity blast caused by an improvised explosive device (IED).”After the blasts, the cafe owners reported two explosions within a span of only 10 seconds.They stated they are fully cooperating with authorities and extending all possible assistance to the injured individuals.Cafe owner's response on blastRameshwaram Cafe, a popular eatery that witnessed a bomb blast at its Brookefield branch, stated,"We are deeply saddened by the unfortunate incident at our Brookefield branch. We are cooperating with the authorities and officials in their investigations."Divya Raghavendra Rao“Two back-to-back blasts in less than 10 seconds! Never ever did I expect that a bomb would explode in our restaurant. It is indeed shocking and I am unable to come to terms with what has happened , ” said Divya Raghavendra Rao.The Bengaluru Police has registered a case under the stringent Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act and Explosives Substances Act in connection with the explosion at the cafe.Who are Rameshwaram cafe owners, Raghavendra Rao and Divya Raghavendra RaoRaghavendra Rao, co-founder and CEO of the cafe, has more than 20 years of experience in the food industry.CCTV captures the precise moment the explosion struck the popular Bengaluru Rameshwaram cafeCo-founder and MD Divya Raghavendra Rao is a chartered accountant and IIM-Ahmedabad graduate, and she heads the management and finance department.Currently in Hyderabad attending to her two-and-a-half-month-old baby, Divya spoke in detail about the food joint’s security and its compliance with rules.Provided catering services for Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding celebrationThe Rameshwaram Cafe operates four outlets in the Bengaluru, strategically located in prime locations. Their popularity is evident as they were chosen to provide catering services at the pre-wedding celebration of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant in Jamnagar.Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding rituals: Mukesh Ambani and family serve food to villagers during Anna Seva“The Rameshwaram Cafe runs four outlets in the city. The owners opened branches at prime locations. Multiple factors such as variety of foods served, hygiene maintained, positive social media reviews earned it a good name. The popularity of The Rameshwaram Cafe is so high they provided catering services at the Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant’s pre-wedding bash at Jamnagar,”said PC Rao, president of Bruhat Bengaluru Hotels’ Association.About the AuthorTOI City DeskThe TOI City Desk is an indefatigable team of journalists dedicated to bringing you the pulse of cities from across the nation, all day and all night. Our mission is to curate, report, and deliver city news that matters to readers of The Times of India. With a keen focus on urban life, governance, culture, and local issues, we provide a comprehensive view of the ever-evolving cityscapes. Our team works tirelessly to keep readers informed about the latest developments, ensuring that they are connected to the heartbeat of cities across India, right when it happens. A sleek diamond brooch, a neatly gelled hairdo, and his infectious smile enhanced his overall look, adding a touch of charm and elegance  The crème de la crème of society ascended at Jamnagar, Gujarat last evening for the pre-wedding extravaganza of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant. From Shah Rukh Khan, to Salman Khan to Rihanna to Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan, the entire tinsel town showered their wishes on the couple, who will tie the knot later this year. Pictures and videos from the event went viral on social media and amongst others, Alia Bhatt stunned with her glam appearance.The Darlings actor shined in a shimmery black gown with a deep neck front. For the occasion, he opted for a formal attire, wearing a black blazer paired with a crisp white shirt. A sleek diamond brooch, a neatly gelled hairdo, and his infectious smile enhanced his overall look, adding a touch of charm and elegance.Akash Ambani was spotted enjoying the evening festivities with some guests and dignitaries. As the patriarch of the family, his pride in witnessing his youngest son's journey to matrimony was evident in his radiant smile. Shibani Dandekar sang 'Aaiye Meharbaan', Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone shared their final look, and Bollywood actors including Kareena Kapoor and Sonam Kapoor have arrived. The bash has different events and dress codes, lasting for three days.  Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-eedding festivities have kicked off in Jamnagar with some eye-catching onstage performances. In a recent video, Shibani Dandekar, actress-singer and wife of Farhan Akhtar, was seen singing Asha Bhosle’s ‘Aaiye Meharbaan’ with full energy that has stolen netizens' hearts. She looked stunning in an orange gown with puff sleeves.A few hours ago, Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone shared their final look for attending the pre-wedding ceremony. Ranveer looks dashing in a white suit with his signature big black shades, while Deepika changed the show in a black princess-cut dress with a green necklace and earrings. Bollywood actors including Kareena Kapoor, Sonam Kapoor, Anil Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan, Varun Dhawan, and Ananya Panday have reached Jamnagar to attend the event.Deepika Padukone & Ranveer Singh get mobbed in Jamnagar | Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-weddingThe pre-wedding bash lasts for three days. On Day 1, ‘An Evening in Everland’ will have the dress code as an elegant cocktail. Day 2 is named ‘A Walk on the Wildside’ and suggests dressing up with a ‘jungle fever’ theme. The last day has two events, ‘Tusker Trails,’ and the final party is ‘Hastakshar’ for which guests are asked to wear elegant Indian traditional clothes.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Eminent personalities like Ivanka Trump, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg, cricketer Mahendra Singh Dhoni and his wife Sakshi Dhoni, Sadhguru, among others, graced the mega event.  The three-day pre-wedding bash of Reliance Industries Chairman Mukesh Ambani's youngest son Anant Ambani and industrialist Viren Merchant's daughter Radhika Merchant began on Friday evening in Gujarat's Jamnagar. The list of attendees includes the global who's who, from the business world to Bollywood superstars, cricketers, and more. As the first day of the celebrations draws to a close, photos from inside show celebrities enjoying dinner and the afterparty in a luxurious way.Prominent Bollywood celebrities like Ajay Devgn, Akshay Kumar, Saif Ali Khan, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Natasha Poonawala and Adar Poonawalla were seen posing for photographs. Eminent personalities like Ivanka Trump, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg, cricketer Mahendra Singh Dhoni and his wife Sakshi Dhoni, Sadhguru, among others, graced the mega event.See More: Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding LIVE Updates: Rihanna ignites the stage with her electrifying performanceAt the grand affair, pop sensation Rihanna gave an electrifying performance on stage and entralled the audience with her chartbusters.Revealed! Rihanna's fee for performing at Anant Ambani's pre-wedding bash will blow your mind!Rihanna took to the stage on the inaugural day of the wedding celebrations. Dressed in a body-hugging yellow outfit, the pop icon radiated energy and enthusiasm as she belted out chart-topping hits, leaving the audience spellbound. The ambiance was electric as guests enjoyed the spectacle.As the celebrations continue to unfold over the next few days, guests eagerly anticipate further moments of splendor and extravagance, marking the beginning of a new chapter in the lives of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant. Aamir Khan sends his blessings to Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodAamir Khan sends his blessings to Anant Ambani and Radhika MerchantTrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerAamir Khan sends his blessings to Anant Ambani and Radhika MerchantTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Mar 2, 2024, 01:38 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us Aamir Khan showered blessings upon Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant as they embarked on their journey of marital bliss. With genuine warmth and sincerity, Aamir conveyed his heartfelt congratulations to the couple, expressing his sincere wishes for a lifetime filled with happiness, health, and prosperity.  Aamir Khan showered blessings upon Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant as they embarked on their journey of marital bliss. With genuine warmth and sincerity, Aamir conveyed his heartfelt congratulations to the couple, expressing his sincere wishes for a lifetime filled with happiness, health, and prosperity. In a heartfelt message, Aamir, who is currently at the wedding venue, shared, "I really wish the couple a very very happy life together, long and healthy life together, with a lot of joy, excitement, adventure, and a very fulfilling life." The three-day pre-wedding festivities of Anant and Radhika has already begun in Jamnagar.From Bollywood celebs like Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, Ranbir Kapoor, Akshay Kumar, Saif Ali Khan to famous sports personalities like MS Dhoni, Rohit Sharma, Sachin Tendulkar, who's who from different fields has arrived to attend the lavish celebrations.Savour the Spectacle: Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's nuptials feature a gastronomic gala of epic proportionsThe events on Day 1 kicked off at 5.30 pm, with 'An Evening in Everland at the Conservatory', which will have 'Elegant Cocktail' as the dress code for the guests, followed by welcome speeches by the family.It will be followed by 'Cirque De Soleil', which is being described as "a spectacle of extraordinary performances", followed by 'Vantara Show' which is being described as "Marvel at the beauty of the Animal kingdom".See More: Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding LIVE Updates: Aamir Khan sends his blessings to the soon-to-be married couplePost the Vantara Show, the grand pre-wedding festivities will feature a special 'Drone Show', about which an official release stated "watch the sky come alive with a never seen before dazzling display".Followed by a special performance by pop sensation Rihanna. The picture described the performance as "Join the Euphoria as Rihanna performs in India for the first time."Day 1 will end with Dinner and an Afterparty, "a perfect end to a magical evening."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant wedding; inside pics, are here!, pictures, images, photo | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant pre-wedding; inside pics are here!TrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant pre-wedding; inside pics are here!TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Mar 2, 2024, 13:37 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us Commencing in Jamnagar with the lavish 'An Evening in Everland,' the Ambani pre-wedding celebrations provided a fascinating glimpse into the extravagant affair. Brimming with stars and extravagance, the recently unveiled inside pictures showcase Anant Ambani, Radhika Merchant, and the Ambani family, providing a captivating preview of the opulent festivities scheduled for the upcoming three days. (Picture Courtesy: Facebook) As the Ambani pre-wedding celebrations kicked off in Jamnagar with the spectacular 'An Evening in Everland,' the world got an interesting peek into the dazzling affair. Star-studded and opulent, the inside pictures of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant, along with the Ambani family, have surfaced, offering a captivating insight into the luxurious festivities that are set to unfold over the next three days.Radiating tradition and style, the Ambani family looked resplendent in their traditional attire in the pictures.Rihanna steals the show at pre-wedding bash of Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant in JamnagarAnant Ambani, in particular, showcased a blend of opulence and spirituality with the symbol of Lord Ganesha intricately stitched onto his lavish ensemble. The family portraits captured the essence of elegance, illuminating the pre-wedding celebrations with cultural richness.Check out the pics here.The grandeur of the event attracted a constellation of notable figures, including Mark Zuckerberg, Bill Gates, Shah Rukh Khan, and MS Dhoni, who graced the celebration with their presence. Jamnagar, Gujarat, has become the epicenter of this star-studded affair, hosted by the visionary billionaire Mukesh Ambani.At the core of these extravagant celebrations is the impending union of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant, a 29-year-old industrialist's daughter. Engaged since January last year, the couple is set to tie the knot on July 12 in what promises to be a wedding for the ages.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Anant Ambani Pre Wedding Decor: Manish Malhotra reveals stunning decor at Anant Ambani-Radhika's pre-wedding bash | Times of IndiaMar 2, 2024​Manish Malhotra reveals stunning decor at Anant Ambani-Radhika's pre-wedding bashAakanksha SharmaThe beautiful decor Sharing pictures from the pre-wedding celebrations in Jamnagar, Manish Malhotra shared these beautiful pictures of the decor. He captioned the post on Instagram and dedicated the decor to Nita Ambani's visions. manishmalhotra05/InstagramShared the joy on Instagram Captioning his Instagram post, Malhotra wrote "Creative Indian Artistry in #jamnagar at its Finest under the guidance of Mrs Nita Ambani. #anantradhikaprewedding #jamnagar ♥️"manishmalhotra05/InstagramAdorable elephant figurinesInstead of the plain, old handles, the doors feature adorable elephant doorknobs. When thought about intently, these elephants could be a representation of the ones rescued and saved in Vantara. manishmalhotra05/InstagramFairytale decor The decor in Jamnagar looks absolutely like a fairy tale in real life. The beautiful and mesmerising scenes look straight out of an angel's book. manishmalhotra05/InstagramBeautiful illustrations Another picture shared by Manish Malhotra features this beautiful illustration of a monkey and the beautiful, simple trees around. The theme and the encouragement of Vantara is evident through the decor. manishmalhotra05/InstagramBeautiful bandhanwarsIn this picture we can also spot some bandhanwars above and beautifully drawn birds and trees. These little details give it the perfect Indian touch. manishmalhotra05/InstagramYou may also likeTrending home decor ideas for that uniqu...Jeff Leatham: The floral designer at Ana...Beautiful flowers All around the venue, the beauty of one thing is constant and that is the flowers. From pink to whites and the beautiful lilcas, the florals are so on point. manishmalhotra05/InstagramPlush cushion and dazzling chandeliers In this picture we can spot a plush, pink cushion for seating and a beautiful, shimmery chandelier on top giving the room a very contemporary vibe. manishmalhotra05/InstagramSeating and ambience Captioning another post, Malhotra wrote, "Mrs Nita Ambani s Passion for Craft , Art and Perfection leads to a beautiful vision of different artists coming together and making unforgettable memories 💖 #jamnagar 💖". manishmalhotra05/InstagramOverall, a masterpiece!There is no doubt in claiming that Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding celebrations are a total piece of art. From the illustrations to the adorable doorknobs, the pre-wedding is nothing short of a marvel. manishmalhotra05/InstagramThanks For Reading!Next: Trending home decor ideas for that unique touchRead Next

Rashid Khan poses with Sidharth Malhotra, Kiara Advani at Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodRashid Khan poses with Sidharth Malhotra, Kiara Advani at Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivitiesTrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerRashid Khan poses with Sidharth Malhotra, Kiara Advani at Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivitiesTOI Entertainment Desk / ANI / Updated: Mar 2, 2024, 22:32 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us The grand pre-and Radhika Merchant are going on in full swing in Jamnagar, Gujarat. n Saturday, Afghanistan spinner Rashid Khan took to Instagram and shared a picture with B-town couple and actors Sidharth Malhotra and Kiara Advani.  The grand pre-wedding festivities of Anant Amband Radhika Merchant are going on in full swing in Jamnagar, Gujarat.Reliance Chairman Mukesh Ambani's youngest son, Anant Ambani, is set to tie the knot with industrialist Viren Merchant's daughter, Radhika Merchant, later this year.From Bollywood celebs like Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, Akshay Kumar to famous sports personalities like MS Dhoni, Rohit Sharma, Sachin Tendulkar, who's who from different fields has arrived to attend the celebrations.On Saturday, Afghanistan spinner Rashid Khan took to Instagram and shared a picture with B-town couple and actors Sidharth Malhotra and Kiara Advani.He captioned the pic, "Weekend vibes with @sidmalhotra & @kiaraaliaadvani." In the pictures, Sid and Rashid could be seen twinning in black tuxedo suits, while Kiara looked gorgeous in an all-black bodycon gown.Soon after he shared the picture, it went viral on social media and fans shared their reactions.Day 1 of the festivities witnessed a special drone show followed by a splendid performance by Pop sensation Rihanna, and much more.Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding extravaganza: Here's Jamnagar's take on the celebrity downpour in the citySeveral inside pictures and videos from the first day of the grand event went viral on social media.Founder and chairperson of Reliance Foundation, Nita Ambani spoke about the pre-wedding function of her son, Anant Ambani, with Radhika Merchant.She shared the relevance of art and culture and how she is "passionate" about it, saying, "Throughout my life I have been inspired by arts and culture. It has deeply moved me and I am very passionate about it."While talking about her son's wedding she mentioned, "When it came to my youngest son Anant's wedding with Radhika, I had two important wishes - first, I wanted to celebrate our roots...Jamnagar holds special place in our hearts and has a profound significance. Gujarat is where we come from, it's where Mukesh and his father built the refinery and I started my career by converting this arid and desert like area into a lush green township and a vibrant community." The extravagant ceremony saw prominent Bollywood celebrities like Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, Ranbir Kapoor among several others in attendance. However, Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas were missing from the bash. Her mother Madhu Chopra, who became a part of the festivities, has opened up about her daughter's absence from the Ambani-Merchant wedding celebrations.  The three-day pre-wedding festivities of Reliance Chairman Mukesh Ambani's youngest son Anant Ambani and industrialist Viren Merchant's daughter Radhika Merchant began on March 1. The extravagant ceremony saw prominent Bollywood celebrities like Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, Ranbir Kapoor among several others in attendance. However, Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas were missing from the bash. Her mother Madhu Chopra, who became a part of the festivities, has opened up about her daughter's absence from the Ambani-Merchant wedding celebrations. When Madhu was asked if she is missing Priyanka in Jamnagar, she agreed that she is indeed missing her at the celebrations. However, she said that Priyanka will make up for her absence at the bash. She also told the media that she had been wanting to come to Jamnagar and spoken to Anant many years ago. She added that Anant and Radhika's wedding has been a perfect reason to visit.Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's Day 1 Pre-Wedding Festivities Highlights: Rihanna, Mukesh-NitaOn Day 1, Bollywood celebrities like Ajay Devgn, Akshay Kumar, Saif Ali Khan along with his wife Kareena Kapoor Khan and their sons Taimur and Jehangir including Saif's two kids Sara Ali Khan and Ibrahim Ali Khan from his first wife Amrita Singh, Janhvi Kapoor, Kiara Advani, Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone and many more were seen enjoying the festivities.The guests were also treated to Rihanna's first ever performance in India. The pop star set the stage on fire at the day one of the lavish pre-wedding event. The 38-year-old singer-songwriter thanked the Ambanis for making her a part of the family affair. "Thanks to the Ambani family I'm here tonight in honour of Anant and Radhika. Thank you for having me here. God bless your union. I wish you the best. Congratulations," she said.Meta founder Mark Zuckerberg with philanthropist-wife Priscilla Chan, Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates, former US president Donald Trump's daughter Ivanka, corporate leaders Gautam Adani, Nandan Nilekani, and Adar Poonawala, cricketers Sachin Tendulkar, MS Dhoni, Rohit Sharma and spiritual leader Sadhguru Jaggi Vasudev are also part of the pre-wedding festivities.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Guests from all around the world have already arrived in Jamnagar, Gujarat to attend the pre-wedding festivities of Reliance Chairman Mukesh Ambani's youngest son, Anant Ambani, who is set to tie the knot with industrialist Viren Merchant's daughter, Radhika Merchant. At the grand affair, pop sensation Rihanna gave an electrifying performance on stage and entralled the audience with her chartbusters. Rihanna took to the stage on the inaugural day of the wedding celebrations. Dressed in a body-hugging yellow outfit, the pop icon radiated energy and enthusiasm as she belted out chart-topping hits, leaving the audience spellbound. The ambiance was electric as guests enjoyed the spectacle.        View this post on Instagram            A post shared by ETimes (@etimes) As the celebrations continue to unfold over the next few days, guests eagerly anticipate further moments of splendor and extravagance, marking the beginning of a new chapter in the lives of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant.Revealed! Rihanna's fee for performing at Anant Ambani's pre-wedding bash will blow your mind!Before Rihanna's special performance, the grand pre-wedding festivities featured a special 'Drone Show', about which an official release stated "watch the sky come alive with a never seen before dazzling display". It took place post the Vantara Show, described as "Marvel at the beauty of the Animal kingdom".See More: Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding LIVE Updates: Rihanna ignites the stage with her electrifying performanceDay 1 will end with Dinner and an Afterparty, "a perfect end to a magical evening."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India.
