Akash Ambani and Shloka Mehta's Romantic Moment Steals Hearts at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's Pre-Wedding Celebrations | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodAkash Ambani and Shloka Mehta's romantic moment steals hearts at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding celebrationsTrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerAkash Ambani and Shloka Mehta's romantic moment steals hearts at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding celebrationsTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in /  Mar 2, 2024, 23:22 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us On the second day of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding extravagant celebrations, the spotlight shifted to Mukesh Ambani and Nita Ambani's elder son, Akash Ambani and his wife Shloka Mehta, as they indulged in a romantic escapade amidst nature's embrace. Meanwhile, Isha Ambani, the ever-stylish scion of the Ambani dynasty, continued to mesmerize with her impeccable fashion choices.   As the three-day pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant unfold with grandeur, the Ambanis and the Merchants are leaving no stone unturned to display their impeccable fashion and style statements. On the second day of the extravagant celebrations, the spotlight shifted to Mukesh Ambani and Nita Ambani's elder son, Akash Ambani and his wife Shloka Mehta, as they indulged in a romantic escapade amidst nature's embrace. In a series of enchanting pictures capturing the essence of their love, Akash was seen planting a tender kiss on Shloka's forehead, radiating warmth and affection. The couple shared moments of joy and togetherness, adding a touch of romance to the festivities. Meanwhile, Isha Ambani, the ever-stylish scion of the Ambani dynasty, continued to mesmerize with her impeccable fashion choices. Transitioning from Chanel couture to a striking Louis Vuitton cut-out ensemble, Isha once again commanded attention with her sartorial elegance. Styled to perfection by the renowned Anaita Shroff Adajania, Isha's ethereal looks set the internet ablaze.According to the schedule, Day 2 of the pre-wedding festivities featured a blend of nature exploration and cultural immersion under the themes "A Walk to the Wild Side" and "A Potpourri of Desi Activities."Anant Ambani's emotional speech leaves Mukesh Ambani teary-eyed at grand pre-wedding event: 'My life has not been a bed of roses'First on the agenda was a visit to the Ambani family's animal rescue and rehabilitation center in Jamnagar, Gujarat. Guests were encouraged to dress in line with the theme of "Jungle Fever" for this wildlife adventure.Following the wildlife excursion, attendees will be escorted to 'Mela Rouge' for a vibrant array of traditional South Asian activities. The dress code for this segment is "South Asian Attires," promising a colorful and culturally rich experience for all participants.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Rihanna performs at Anant Ambani, Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding bash in Jamnagar - India Today India TodayNortheastMalayalamBusiness TodayBT BazaarAaj TakLallantopBanglaGNTTViChowkReader’s DigestSports TakCrime TakAstro TakGamingHarper's BazaarBrides TodayCosmopolitanIshq FMAaj Tak CampusKisan TakIndia Today HindiIndia TodayNortheastMalayalamBusiness TodayBT BazaarAaj TakLallantopBanglaGNTTViChowkReader’s DigestMagazineLive TVSearchSEARCHSIGN INDark ModeEdition ININUSHome TVLive TVPrimetimeMagazineLatest EditionInsightLife+StyleIndiaSouthWorldBusinessTechnologyEntertainmentShowbuzzBollywoodHollywoodOTTLatest ReviewsSports SpecialsPodcastsSunday SpecialHistory of ItNewsMoDIUInteractivesOpinionGamesVideosFact Check Other NewsScienceEducationHealthIt's ViralLaw TodayAutoEnvironmentCitiesHoroscopesWeatherFollow Us On:   NewsMusicWatch: Rihanna sets stage on fire at Anant Ambani's pre-wedding bash in JamnagarWatch: Rihanna sets stage on fire at Anant Ambani's pre-wedding bash in JamnagarDay 1 of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding bash was a star-studded affair with pop icon Rihanna giving a stellar performance. Listen to StoryLive TVShareAdvertisementRihanna's performance set the stage on fire during Day 1 of Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding bash. (Screengrab/India Today)India Today Entertainment DeskNew Delhi,UPDATED: Mar 2, 2024 20:02 ISTIn ShortAnant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding bash featured a performance by pop icon RihannaRihanna performed hits like 'Pour it Up', 'Wild Things', 'Diamonds'Around 1,000 personalities are attending the three-day festivities in JamnagarAnant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding jamboree was a starry affair with pop icon and R&B superstar Rihanna's dance moves undoubtedly amounting to the peak highlight of the get-together in Jamnagar. The crowd at the private event was visibly frenzied as Rihanna took to the stage and performed her popular tracks.Rihanna’s performance at the Ambanis' pre-wedding bash was choreographed by Parris Goebel, the same artiste who choreographed her Super Bowl concert. advertisementThe Ambanis are known for celebrating with extravagance, never having hosted a party by halves and Anant Ambani's pre-wedding bash is no exception.Rihanna, who rose to fame after her debut single in 2005, performed on a medley of her songs and hit numbers, including 'Pour it Up', 'Wild Things', 'Diamonds', etc. In visuals accessed by India Today, the artist was seen setting ablaze the atmosphere with her dance moves, which were second to none, along with her entourage.
Wearing a fluorescent green bodycon and glittery gown, Rihanna was seen interacting with distinguished guests at Mukesh Ambani's son's pre-wedding event while performing on the stage. She also performed on her popular track 'Work'. 
The singer, who arrived in Gujarat's Jamnagar on February 29 along with her troupe, is reportedly getting paid a whopping amount of over Rs 50 crore for her performance. Another major highlight of the pre-wedding is said to be renowned illusionist David Blaine's act. Celebrities including Shah Rukh Khan and his family, Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh, Alia Bhatt, Ranbir, Arjun Kapoor, 'Jawan' director Atlee and his family, among others have arrived at Jamnagar for one of the most glamorous events of the year.Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant got engaged in a Gol Dhana ceremony in Mumbai on January 19, 2023. They are hosting pre-wedding festivities at the Reliance Greens Complex in Jamnagar. Close to 1,000 personalities are attending the three-day festivities of the Ambanis and the Merchants. Also, Rihanna is not the first international musician to perform at an Ambani wedding. In 2018, Beyoncé performed at Isha Ambani and Anand Piramal’s sangeet and was rumoured to be paid close to Rs 33 crore.Published By: Srishti JhaPublished On: Mar 2, 2024ALSO READ  |  Deepika Padukone, Kiara Advani are bold and beautiful in black for Ambani bashMust Watch

Anant Ambani's emotional speech leaves Mukesh Ambani teary-eyed at grand pre-wedding event: 'My life has not been a bed of roses' | Etimes - Times of India Videos Sign InTOIhomeVideosMoviesMusicTVWeb Series TrailersLifestylePageantsEventsKidsTrendingAnant AmbaniDeepika Padukone PregnancyAnant Ambani Pre Wedding CelebrationVicky KaushalJustin BieberRihannaAnil AmbaniLaapataa Ladies ReviewRaj KundraAnant AmbaniDeepika Padukone PregnancyAnant Ambani Pre Wedding CelebrationVicky KaushalJustin BieberRihannaAnil AmbaniLaapataa Ladies ReviewRaj KundraAnant AmbaniDeepika Padukone PregnancyAnant Ambani Pre Wedding CelebrationVicky KaushalJustin BieberRihannaAnil AmbaniLaapataa Ladies ReviewRaj KundraEtimesVideosEtimesBollywoodAnant Ambani's emotional speech leaves Mukesh Ambani teary-eyed at grand pre-wedding event: 'My life has not been a bed of roses'16784 views13 hours agoAnant Ambani's emotional speech leaves Mukesh Ambani teary-eyed at grand pre-wedding event: 'My life has not been a bed of roses'Mar 02, 2024, 08:21PM ISTSource: etimes.inAnant Ambani delivered an emotional welcome speech on the first day of his three-day grand pre-wedding event. Visuals of Reliance Chairperson Mukesh Ambani breaking down in tears have gone viral across the internet. During his address at the event, Anant opened up about his health struggles in childhood, moving his father to tears. He expressed, 'My family has gone all out to make me feel special. Everyone has been sleeping for less than 3 hours a day for the last 2-3 months. My life has not been entirely a bed of roses. I have experienced the pain of thorns and faced many health issues since childhood, but my father and mother have never let me feel that I have suffered. They have always stood by me.' Anant Ambani thanked his parents for making him feel special and instilling confidence in him. He added, 'Thank you, Mumma, for all that you've done. All this is created by my Mumma and no one else. For the last four months, she has worked, I think, 18-19 hours a day. I am extremely grateful to Mumma. My father and mother have always stood by me and made me feel that if I think, I'll do it. That is how much my father and mother mean to me, and I will be eternally grateful.' During his speech, Anant referred to himself as a 'lucky man' while talking about his fiancée, Radhika. He said, 'I am 100 percent the lucky one; there is no doubt about that. I also don't know how I got Radhika, so I am definitely the luckiest here. I have known her for seven years, but it feels like we met only yesterday. Every day, I fall more and more in love. I have earthquakes and tsunamis in my heart when I see Radhika.' Earlier this week, the couple commenced their pre-wedding celebrations by organizing a communal feast. Thousands of attendees from nearby villages were hosted and treated to a selection of delightful Gujarati dishes. At the heart of the enchanting three-day celebration is a distinguished gathering of over 1,000 guests, including some of the world's most affluent and influential individuals. Distinguished attendees encompass luminaries such as Bill Gates, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg, and renowned Bollywood stars including Amitabh Bachchan, SRK, Aamir, Deepika, and Ranveer Singh. Anant and Radhika will tie the knot on July 12, 2024.MOVIESView more MOVIES videosFeaturedHindiEnglishTamilTeluguMalayalamKannadaBengaliMarathiGujaratiBhojpuri03:01Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding extravaganza: Here's Jamnagar's take on the celebrity downpour in the city04:24Anant Ambani's emotional speech leaves Mukesh Ambani teary-eyed at grand pre-wedding event: 'My life has not been a bed of roses'03:06Neeti Mohan shares her excitement about performing at Anant Ambani's pre-wedding bash with Pritam07:52Manisha Rani on winning Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa 11, Abhishek Malhan supporting her & KKK 14 offer03:02Marathi actress Ketaki Chitale faces FIR for allegedly making comments about SC-ST (Prevention of Atrocities Act)03:02Ileana D'Cruz pens note about dealing with postpartum depression; "Thank you Mom, Dad": Anant Ambani's emotional speech at pre-wedding event | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomeparentinggetting pregnantpregnancyfirst yeartoddler and Beyondteenmomentsask the expertvideosNewslifestyleparentingmoments"Thank you Mom, Dad": Anant Ambani's speech leaves dad Mukesh Ambani teary-eyedTrendingAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownOptical IllusionBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone RoutineAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownOptical IllusionBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone RoutineAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownOptical IllusionBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone Routine"Thank you Mom, Dad": Anant Ambani's speech leaves dad Mukesh Ambani teary-eyedTOI Lifestyle Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Mar 2, 2024, 19:05 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us Anant Ambani thanks his parents, Mukesh and Nita Ambani, in an emotional speech at his pre-wedding event. He expresses gratitude to his fiancee Radhika Merchant and her parents. Anant's speech moves his father to tears and the video goes viral. The pre-wedding celebrations are grand.  As the groom-to-be Anant Ambani thanked his parents, Mukesh Ambani and Nita Ambani, in his speech at the pre-wedding event, which has several global leaders in attendance, Mukesh Ambani couldn't contain his tears.The emotional speech by Anant Ambani, where he thanked his parents for being his rock-solid support system especially when he was battling health issues, moved dad Mukesh to tears.In the video, which is going viral on social media, we see a poignant moment of parenting where the child realizes the sacrifices made by the parents.Mukesh Ambani can be seen trying hard to hold his tears and emotions.Mukesh Ambani moved to tears as Anant Ambani shares struggles and gratitude in pre-wedding speech"Thank you Mom, Dad""Thank you, Mumma, for all that you've done," Anant Ambani said in the speech. "All this is created by my Mumma and no one else. My mother has gone all out. For the last four months she has worked for, I think, 18-19 hours a day. I am extremely grateful to Mumma.""My father and mother have always stood by me, and they have made me feel that if I think (about doing something), I'll do it. That is how much my father and mother mean to me and I will be eternally grateful," he said."I have earthquakes and tsunamis in my heart when I see Radhika"For his fiancee Radhika, whom he has known for the last 7 years Anant says he is a lucky man to have found her. "I am 100 percent the lucky one; there is no doubt about that. I also don't know how I got Radhika so I am definitely the luckiest here." He added that even though he has known her for seven years it feels like they met only yesterday. "Every day, I fall more and more in love. I have earthquakes and tsunamis in my heart when I see Radhika," Anant said.The speech was a part of the pre-wedding festivities of the Ambani household as the family came together to celebrate the wedding of the youngest child Anant with the daughter of Viren Merchant and Shaila Merchant, Radhika Merchant.Anant and Radhika will tie the wedding knot on July 12, 2024.Before his wedding, Anant Ambani, the youngest scion of the Ambani family, garnered significant attention for his pre-wedding celebrations. The festivities were grand and lavish, befitting the stature of the Ambani family. Preparations included extravagant ceremonies and events, attended by high-profile guests from across the globe. Anant, known for his humility and charm, radiated joy during these celebrations, marking the beginning of a new chapter in his life. The pre-wedding festivities not only showcased the Ambani family's opulence but also highlighted their close-knit bonds and traditions, creating unforgettable memories for all involved.About the AuthorTOI Lifestyle DeskThe TOI Lifestyle Desk is a dynamic team of dedicated journalists who, with unwavering passion and commitment, sift through the pulse of the nation to curate a vibrant tapestry of lifestyle news for The Times of India readers. Mukesh Ambani in tears as son Anant speaks on health issues at pre-wedding event - India Today India TodayNortheastMalayalamBusiness TodayBT BazaarAaj TakLallantopBanglaGNTTViChowkReader’s DigestSports TakCrime TakAstro TakGamingHarper's BazaarBrides TodayCosmopolitanIshq FMAaj Tak CampusKisan TakIndia Today HindiIndia TodayNortheastMalayalamBusiness TodayBT BazaarAaj TakLallantopBanglaGNTTViChowkReader’s DigestMagazineLive TVSearchSEARCHSIGN INDark ModeEdition ININUSHome TVLive TVPrimetimeMagazineLatest EditionInsightLife+StyleIndiaSouthWorldBusinessTechnologyEntertainmentShowbuzzBollywoodHollywoodOTTLatest ReviewsSports SpecialsPodcastsSunday SpecialHistory of ItNewsMoDIUInteractivesOpinionGamesVideosFact Check Other NewsScienceEducationHealthIt's ViralLaw TodayAutoEnvironmentCitiesHoroscopesWeatherFollow Us On:   NewsIndiaMukesh Ambani in tears as son Anant speaks on health issuesMukesh Ambani in tears as Anant speaks on health issues at pre-wedding eventThe three-day grand pre-wedding event of Anant Ambani, the younger son of Mukesh Ambani, and Radhika Merchant, kicked off on Friday.Listen to StoryLive TVShareAdvertisementMukesh Ambani got emotional during son Anant Ambani's speechIndia Today News DeskNew Delhi,UPDATED: Mar 2, 2024 15:18 ISTWritten By: Abhishek DeIn ShortMukesh Ambani gets emotional during Anant Ambani's speechAnant Ambani spoke on childhood health issuesThe pre-wedding festivities kicked off on FridayReliance chairperson Mukesh Ambani broke down as his son Anant Ambani spoke about his health issues during his pre-wedding event in Gujarat's Jamnagar. The three-day grand pre-wedding event of Anant Ambani, the younger son of Mukesh Ambani, and Radhika Merchant, kicked off on Friday.In his address at the event, Anant Ambani thanked his parents for making him feel special and went on to speak about his struggles with health in his childhood. During his address, Mukesh Ambani was seen getting emotional and teary-eyed. advertisement"My family has gone all out to make me feel special. My life has not entirely been a bed of roses. I have experienced the pain of thorns. I have faced many health issues since childhood, but my father and mother have never let me feel that I have suffered. They have always stood by me," Anant said.
The couple started the pre-wedding festivities earlier this week with a community feast, hosting thousands of people from neighbouring villages and serving them Gujarati delicacies.For the main three-day event, more than 1,000 guests, including some of the world's richest people, are in attendance. Notable invitees include Bill Gates, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg, and top Bollywood stars like Amitabh Bachchan, Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan, Deepika Padukone, and Ranveer Singh.On Friday, pop star Rihanna performed for the first time in India as she attended the event. During her performance, Rihanna mesmerised the audience with renditions of some of her timeless hits, such as 'Diamonds', 'Rude Boy', 'Pour It Up', and more.Published By: Abhishek DePublished On: Mar 2, 2024Must Watch

The elegant evening saw Bollywood celebrities and Rihanna performing. Shah Rukh Khan, in a black suit with a diamond necklace, attended with his family - Aryan, Suhana, Gauri and Abram.   Inside pictures from Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivity are trickling in and the first day was all about partying hard. The elegant cocktail evening saw who's who of Bollywood in attendance, while Rihanna took the stage for an electrifying performance. Dwayne Bravo shared a series of pictures from the glamorous event, posing with Shah Rukh Khan and Ranveer Singh.He captioned the post, "Wedding vibes! Chilling with the big boys! @iamsrk @ranveersingh Bollywood meets Cricket...#SirChampion." For the evening, Shah Rukh Khan wore a sharp black suit minus the shirt. With hair combed back, the actor added a dazzling diamond necklace to his OOTN. While the soon-to-be father Ranveer Singh opted for an all-white look.Shah Rukh Khan attended the function with his entire family in tow - Gauri, Aryan, Suhana and Abram. The actor arrived in Jamnagar a couple of days back. On the work front, Shah Rukh Khan is riding high on the success of three big hits on 2023 - Pathaan, Jawan and Dunki. The actor is now looking forward to Tiger Vs Pathaan, with Salman Khan. This movie will go on floors this year and is slated to hit the screens in 2025. Apart from this, SRK is also rumoured to join forces with his daughter Suhana for a movie, however there has been no confirmation about the same. Anant Ambani expresses gratitude and love for Radhika Merchant in his pre-wedding speech | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomelifestylerelationshiphealth & fitnessstylevisual storiestrendingparentingthe artssoul searchbeautybooksrecipesfood newstravelhome & gardeneventsspotlightvideoslove & sexworkpetssoul curryask the expertvideosNewslifestylerelationshipslove-sexI'm 100% the lucky one: Anant Ambani says he is the lucky one to have Radhika Merchant in his pre-wedding speechTrendingAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownOptical IllusionBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone RoutineAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownOptical IllusionBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone RoutineAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownOptical IllusionBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone RoutineI'm 100% the lucky one: Anant Ambani says he is the lucky one to have Radhika Merchant in his pre-wedding speechTOI Lifestyle Desk / TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Updated: Mar 2, 2024, 15:45 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's grand wedding celebrations began with a glamorous cocktail night. Anant expressed gratitude to family, shared personal struggles, and thanked Radhika's family. Mukesh Ambani was proud of Anant's speech.  Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's grand three-day wedding celebrations kicked off with a glamourous cocktail night on March 1 in Jamnagar. The cocktail night was attended by the who's who of the business, tech, Bollywood and celebrity world. Pop sensation, Rihanna also performed for the new couple in town Anant and Radhika.During the celebrations, Anant Ambani also gave a speech wherein he not only thanked his parents but also credited them and his late grandfather Dhirubhai Ambani and grandmother Kokilaben Ambani for inspiring him.Expressing his gratitude to his mother for pulling together the lavish three-day pre-wedding festivities in Jamnagar, Anant said in his speech, “Thank you mom for all that you’ve done. All this is created by my mother and no one else. My mother has gone all out… For four months she has worked, I think, for 18-19 hours a day. I am extremely grateful to mom and thank you so much."He added, "I would like to thank each and everyone of you present here. I know every one has made it to Jamnagar to make me and Radhika feel special. We are honoured and humbled to have all of you here. I am sorry if we have caused any inconvenience to any one. Please do forgive us, both the families. I hope everyone is going to enjoy the coming three days and I would like to thank my mother, my father, my sister, my brother, my sister-in-law, and my brother-in-law for making this event so memorable for me and Radhika. I think my family has gone all out to make us feel special. Everyone has been sleeping for less than three hours a day for the last two to three months and I'm so happy I can share this joy with everyone out here."Talking about his personal struggles and how his parents have always supported him, Anant said, "As many of you know my life has not always been an entire bed of roses. I have also experienced the pain of thorns. I have faced many health crisis. But my father and mother have never let me feel that I have suffered. My father and mother have always stood by me and they have always made me feel that if I think, I'll do it. I think that is what my father and mother mean to me, and I am eternally grateful to them."On loveSharing how grateful he is to have Radhika as his life partner, Anant further said, "I'm 100% the lucky one (to get Radhika), there is no doubt about that! I also don't know how I got Radhika. While I know Radhika for the last seven years, it feels I met Radhika just yesterday. But everyday I fall more in love with her. Like my brother-in-law, Anand Piramal, says-- when he used to see my sister Isha he had volcanoes and fountains going up in his heart. I would say I have earthquakes and tsunamis going on in my heart when I see Radhika. So thank you Radhika for everything. Viren uncle, Shaila aunty, Anjali-Aman, thank you for welcoming me into your family with open arms. I am extremely thankful and grateful to you for having the patience for the last seven years, finally the day is coming."On his grandparents(Image: https://www.instagram.com/nitaambaniril/)Anant also took the blessings from his grandmother, Kokilaben Ambani whom he "takes great inspiration from". Sharing how close he is to his maternal grandmother, he added, "My nani is a nagar-brahmin. I have stayed mostly with my nani when I was young and she has taught me everything... Radhika's Nana and my Nana blessing us from top, I'm sure they'll be extremely happy today."He also shared how his dream-project Vantara-- which aims at rescuing, treating and rehabilitating injured wild animals-- is due to his grandfather Dhirubhai Ambani and his parents' support. "My parents taught me to always serve others, and this is my way of giving back to the society... I started of small. My grandfather said 'Dare to dream', so i dreamt and made it a reality," Anant said.Hearing Anant's speech, Mukesh Ambani looked quite touched and proud as a father of the to-be groom. Earlier, Mukesh has shared in his speech at the celebrations about how he saw his late father Dhirubhai's determination in Anant.Here's wishing Anant and Radhika's a happy life together!Amitabh Bachchan, Manushi Chhillar and other celebs flock to Anant Ambani and Radhika's pre-wedding gala in Gujarat's JamnagarAbout the AuthorTOI Lifestyle DeskThe TOI Lifestyle Desk is a dynamic team of dedicated journalists who, with unwavering passion and commitment, sift through the pulse of the nation to curate a vibrant tapestry of lifestyle news for The Times of India readers. Know the Significance of ‘Anna Seva’ performed by Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant | - Times of IndiaEditionININUSSign InTOIAstrologyHoroscopeZodiacs & AstrologyYearly Horoscope 2024kundali dasha & RemediesReligionMonthly HoroscopeOthersWeb StoriesToday's ePaperNewsAstrology NewsKnow the Significance of ‘Anna Seva’ performed by Anant Ambani and Radhika MerchantTrendingHoroscope TodayAries HoroscopeTaurus HoroscopeAaj Ka PanchangLeo HoroscopeScorpio HoroscopeHoroscope TodayAries HoroscopeTaurus HoroscopeAaj Ka PanchangLeo HoroscopeScorpio HoroscopeHoroscope TodayAries HoroscopeTaurus HoroscopeAaj Ka PanchangLeo HoroscopeScorpio HoroscopeKnow the Significance of ‘Anna Seva’ performed by Anant Ambani and Radhika MerchantTOI Astrology /  Mar 2, 2024, 11:12 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us The pre-marriage celebrations for Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant commenced with 'anna seva', a symbol of serving humanity and fostering love, compassion, and collaboration. Anna Seva strengthens spiritual bonds and promotes meaningful interactions in a marriage.  ‘Marriage’ is one of the most significant and crucial parts of ‘16 Sanskaar’ as prescribed in our shastras. The pre-marriage celebrations for Anant Ambani, the youngest son of Reliance Industries Chairman Mukesh Ambani, and Radhika Merchant, the daughter of industrialist Viren Merchant, have commenced with 'anna seva'.Let us dive into details and understand the significance of ‘Anna Seva’ as per traditions and shastra:What is ‘Anna Seva’?Selfless service, or seva, is a spiritual practice that aims to transcend the ego and develop empathy for all beings.It embodies the idea of "Nishkama Karma," which is the practice of doing without regard for the results of one's deeds.Fundamentally, Anna Seva is the act of giving meals to people in need without thinking about getting anything in return. Anna Seva is a highly esteemed figure who represents kindness, giving, and peace in society. Caste, creed, and religious barriers are transcended, highlighting the universality of human goodwill.‘Anna Seva’ - The Epitome of Karma YogaKarma Yoga is centred on Nishkama Karma, which in turn blesses the human with purity at mind, body, and soul levels. Anna Seva helps people dedicate themselves to society. Serving food thanks them for plenty and connects them to all. Karma Yoga's Anna Seva practice fosters spiritual growth and transformation. Healing the mind and cultivating compassion are steps to self-realisation.Significance of ‘Anna Seva’Our classics explicitly teach 'serving humanity is service to the almighty’ and ‘anna seva’ is a great example of serving the needy human kind without any discrimination.Significance of ‘Anna Seva’ in MarriageAnna Seva is of the utmost symbolic significance in pre marriage ceremonies. The couple values hospitality, kindness, and social responsibility.While doing Anna Seva together, couples can overcome their differences and uphold the unison of two souls as one soul going after and work with oneness in approach toward serving others and upholding morality.Anna Seva activities improve marriages and develop collaboration. Serving food shows compassion, empathy, and generosity, which are essential for a happy marriage.Serving together strengthens partners' spiritual bonds, helping them grow in love and wisdom.Serving food together as a pair fosters meaningful interactions, shared experiences, and increased emotional bonding at energy level.We wish the couple a blessed time aheadThis article is written by Sidhharrth S Kumaar, Astro Numerologist, Energy Healer, Life & Relationship Coach, NumroVani.FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA Visual Stories   PreviousTop 5 Zodiac Signs That Are Inclined Towards Acting CareerindiaHow Your Zodiac Sign Deals With Breakupindia5 Zodiac Signs That Make Fake PromisesindiaLove and Relationship Horoscope for March 2024indiaLove and Relationship Horoscope for February 29, 2024indiaZodiac Signs Who Are Born Fightersindia​How Each Zodiac Sign Acts When They Like Someone​india​Love Horoscope for February 28, 2024indiaLove and Relationship Horoscope for February 27, 2024indiaThe Most Selfish Zodiac Signs As Per Astrologyindia Next123Hot PicksMP Gautam GambhirAir India FineNoida Student Killing CaseAkasa Air Bomb Threat NewsPM ModiShubhkaran SinghJNU Student Clash NewsTOP TRENDINGRameshwaram CafePM Modi in BiharPakistan Ravi RiverKolkata Dancer Amarnath GhoshPriyanka GandhiHimachal Congress CrisisDMK ISRO ad with Chinese flagBJP Lok Sabha Candidates ListVemireddy Prabhakar ReddyBCCI player contractsTrending StoriesIn AstrologyEntire WebsiteHoroscope Today, December 6, 2023: Read your daily astrological prediction for Aquarius, Pisces and OthersHoroscope Today, December 1, 2023: Read your daily astrological prediction for Aries, Taurus and OthersHoroscope Today, November 24, 2023: Read your daily astrological predictionHoroscope Today, November 20, 2023: Read your daily astrological predictionHoroscope Today, November 17, 2023: Read your daily astrological prediction for Aries; Radhika Merchant dazzles in the Abu Jani Sandeep Khosla ensemble at Anant Ambani's extravagant pre-wedding event | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodRadhika Merchant dazzles in the Abu Jani Sandeep Khosla ensemble at Anant Ambani's extravagant pre-wedding eventTrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerRadhika Merchant dazzles in the Abu Jani Sandeep Khosla ensemble at Anant Ambani's extravagant pre-wedding eventTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in /  Mar 2, 2024, 17:22 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us Radhika Merchant captured the attention at her pre-wedding festivities, donning an enchanting ensemble meticulously designed by Abu Jani Sandeep Khosla. The soon-to-be bride adorned herself in a Chikankari ghagra, skillfully crafted with three hues, showcasing Abu Sandeep's mastery in the cherished embroidery art. Complementing the exquisite ghagra was a western-style embroidered blouse, embellished with pearls, stones, sequins, and Resham (Picture Courtesy: Facebook) Radhika Merchant stole the spotlight at her pre-wedding celebration in a mesmerizing ensemble crafted by Abu Jani Sandeep Khosla. The bride-to-be graced the occasion wearing a three-colored Chikankari ghagra, a masterpiece that pays homage to Abu Sandeep's expertise in the beloved embroidery technique. The exquisite attire was paired with a western-embroidered blouse, adorned with pearls, stones, sequins, and Resham, adding a touch of contemporary flair to the traditional ensemble.As the prelude to Asia's most anticipated wedding unfolds, Mukesh Ambani, Asia's richest man, leaves no stone unturned in ensuring a grand celebration for his 28-year-old son, Anant Ambani. The vibrant pre-wedding festivities, set in the family's refinery township of Jamnagar in Gujarat, promise a lavish affair with no expenses spared. Anant Ambani is all set to tie the knot with his childhood sweetheart, Radhika Merchant, the 29-year-old daughter of Indian billionaire Viren Merchant.Inside glimpses of Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festvitiesWhile the grand wedding ceremony is scheduled for July, the three-day pre-wedding extravaganza commenced on March 1, marking the beginning of a celebration that has attracted some of the biggest names from Wall Street, Silicon Valley, and the entertainment industry. Several celebrities, ranging from Shah Rukh Khan to Rihanna, have graced the 3-day pre-wedding festivities.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Beyond the breaking news, we present a celebration of culture. Isha Ambani graces Day 2 of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities with Chanel couture | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodIsha Ambani graces Day 2 of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities with Chanel coutureTrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerIsha Ambani graces Day 2 of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities with Chanel coutureTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Mar 2, 2024, 20:43 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us The Ambanis and Merchants have been making fashion statements with their sartorial choices at the grand three-day pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant in Jamnagar. On the second day of the celebrations, Anaita Shroff Adajania has unveiled the look of Isha Ambani donning an ensemble from Chanel Spring-Summer 2018 Haute Couture.  The Ambanis and Merchants have been making fashion statements with their sartorial choices at the grand three-day pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant in Jamnagar. On the second day of the celebrations, Anaita Shroff Adajania has unveiled the look of Isha Ambani donning an ensemble from Chanel Spring-Summer 2018 Haute Couture.In one of the pictures, Isha could be seen holding her twins Aadiya and Krishna in her arms. Another picture features, Isha playing with her baby boy. While Aadiya wore a black-hued frock with bow detailing, Krishna looked cute in a tuxedo. On November 19, 2022, Isha and Anand welcomed their twin baby girl and baby boy. For the inaugural day of the wedding celebrations, Isha graced the occasion in a mesmerizing ensemble from Miss Sohee's Spring Summer 2024 collection. The nude corseted gown accentuated her silhouette, adorned with delicate 3D cherry blossoms and magnolia flower branches intricately intertwined with majestic peacock embroidery crafted with SWAROVSKI crystals.Anant Ambani's emotional speech leaves Mukesh Ambani teary-eyed at grand pre-wedding event: 'My life has not been entirely a bed of roses'On Day 2 of the gala event, new family portraits of the Ambani family were shared on social media. Taking to Instagram, official handle of Nita Mukesh Ambani Cultural Centre shared a string of beautiful family pictures which they captioned, "Special moments of love reserved for their son Anant and his fiancee Radhika even as doting parents Nita and Mukesh Ambani open their hearts and home at Jamnagar to welcome guests for the pre-wedding festivities, in a true embodiment of 'Atithi Devo Bhava' or 'Guest is God' tradition of India."In the pictures, the groom's parents and Reliance chairman Mukesh Ambani can be seen posing with his wife Nita Ambani, son Anant Ambani, and his would-be daughter-in-law, Radhika Merchant. In one of the photos, Mukesh Ambani was seen planting a kiss on his son Anant's cheek, while another pic showcased Nita Ambani holding the groom-to-be close.Nita and Mukesh Ambani looked beautiful as they were seen twinning in beige traditional Indian outfits. In another pic, Radhika and her soon-to-be father-in-law are seen posing together and flaunting their million-dollar smiles. Isha Ambani's Heartwarming Speech at Anant Ambani's Pre-Wedding Bash | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodIsha Ambani delivers heartwarming speech at her brother Anant Ambani's pre-wedding bashTrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerIsha Ambani delivers heartwarming speech at her brother Anant Ambani's pre-wedding bashTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in /  Mar 2, 2024, 21:31 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us In a heartwarming moment during the inaugural day of her brother Anant Ambani's pre-wedding celebrations, Isha Ambani took center stage to deliver a sweet speech, expressing gratitude to the guests and sharing heartfelt sentiments as the Ambani family prepares to welcome Anant's bride-to-be Radhika Merchant.  In a heartwarming moment during the inaugural day of her brother Anant Ambani's pre-wedding celebrations, Isha Ambani took center stage to deliver a sweet speech, expressing gratitude to the guests and sharing heartfelt sentiments as the Ambani family prepares to welcome Anant's bride-to-be Radhika Merchant. Isha began her speech by extending her appreciation to Shibani Dandekar, whose captivating performance added an extra layer of magic to the festivities."Ladies and gentlemen, today marks a joyous occasion as we are gathered to celebrate the union of my beloved brother Anant, and his bride-to-be Radhika. I must take a moment to express my deepest gratitude to the incredibly talented Shibani whose beautiful voice has added an extra layer of magic today. Thank you, Shibani," she said, acknowledging the musical contribution to the special day. Isha further expressed gratitude towards the guests for their presence and trust in the family's arrangements in Jamnagar. "Most of all, I want to extend a heartfelt thank you to each and every one of you for gracing us with your presence here in Jamnagar. Your willingness to travel with us without knowing what your accommodations look like and the inability for anyone of you to Google what would look like really means a lot to us," she expressed.Inside glimpses of Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festvitiesContinuing her speech, Isha reflected on the significance of Jamnagar as a special place for her family, expressing gratitude for the support and warmth they have experienced there. "Thank you for trusting us and thank you for being here for celebrating with us. We are so thrilled to have you in our special place. Jamnagar has been our home. It has been a place for my family and me, as a place been truly truly special," she shared.Day 1 of the festivities witnessed a special drone show followed by a splendid performance by Pop sensation Rihanna and much more. From Bollywood celebs like Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, Akshay Kumar to famous sports personalities like MS Dhoni, Rohit Sharma, Sachin Tendulkar, who's who from different fields has arrived to attend the celebrations. Several inside pictures and videos from the first day of the grand event went viral on social media. (Photo: Instagram)Srimoyee ChowdhuryNew Delhi,UPDATED: Mar 1, 2024 23:23 ISTMeta CEO Mark Zuckerberg and his wife Priscilla Chan attended Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding event on March 1 in chic outfits by Alexander McQueen. The grand celebrations commenced today in Gujarat's Jamnagar and will continue till March 3.Zuckerberg and Priscilla made a grand entrance, captivating everyone's attention with their meticulously coordinated outfits that radiated elegance and sophistication. Mark Zuckerberg was particularly eye-catching in his black-on-black firefly blazer and matching shoes from Alexander McQueen, elevating his entire look to new heights.advertisementPriscilla Chan complemented him perfectly, looking stunning in an Alexander McQueen black gown adorned with gold flower details, her appearance enhanced by tasteful accessories including tiny stud earrings, a dainty chain bracelet, and a layered gold necklace.Take a look at their outfits:
View this post on Instagram
A post shared by Mark Zuckerberg (@zuck)
The celebrations, set to last for three days, promise an extravaganza of style and elegance, with each day themed differently to add to the festivity's charm.The Alexander McQueen outfits worn by the social media mogul and his wife are available on the website for purchase as well.
The first day, dubbed ‘An Evening in Everland,’ saw guests in elegant cocktail attire, setting a high standard for the days to follow. The second day, ‘A Walk on the Wildside,’ is expected to bring out ‘Jungle Fever’ attire, adding a touch of adventure to the celebrations.The pre-wedding bash of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant has certainly become the talk of the town for its unique blend of tradition, elegance, and creativity.Published By: Srimoyee ChowdhuryPublished On: Mar 1, 2024Also Read |  Isha Ambani is pretty in pink in first look from brother Anant's pre-wedding eventMust Watch

Adding to the excitement, Bollywood's renowned fashion stylist, costume designer, and actress Anaita Shroff Adajania has unveiled the much-awaited first look of Isha Ambani for the inaugural day of the wedding celebrations.  As the grand three-day pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant kick off in Jamnagar, the anticipation for fashion statements and sartorial elegance is at an all-time high. Adding to the excitement, Bollywood's renowned fashion stylist, costume designer, and actress Anaita Shroff Adajania has unveiled the much-awaited first look of Isha Ambani for the inaugural day of the wedding celebrations.Isha Ambani, daughter of Mukesh Ambani and Nita Ambani, is all set to grace the occasion in a mesmerizing ensemble from Miss Sohee's Spring Summer 2024 collection. The nude corseted gown accentuated her silhouette, adorned with delicate 3D cherry blossoms and magnolia flower branches intricately intertwined with majestic peacock embroidery crafted with SWAROVSKI crystals.Paired with a petal-inspired sculptural shawl, Isha's attire resonated with timeless grace, capturing the essence of elegance and opulence synonymous with the Ambani family. Anaita took to her Instagram to express her delight in curating Isha Ambani's ensemble for the auspicious occasion.From Bollywood celebs like Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, Ranbir Kapoor to famous sports personalities like MS Dhoni, Rohit Sharma, Sachin Tendulkar, who's who from different fields has arrived to attend the lavish celebrations.Cuteness alert! Mukesh Ambani and wife Nita groove to 'Pyaar Hua Iqraar Hua Hai'; netizens reactFounder and chairperson of Reliance Foundation, Nita Ambani spoke about the pre-wedding function of her son, Anant Ambani, with Radhika Merchant. She shared the relevance of art and culture and how she is "passionate" about it, saying, "Throughout my life I have been inspired by arts and culture. It has deeply moved me and I am very passionate about it."See More: Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding LIVE Updates: Ranveer and Deepika opt for classic black and white outfits for the occasionWhile talking about her son's wedding she mentioned, "When it came to my youngest son Anant's wedding with Radhika, I had two important wishes - first, I wanted to celebrate our roots...Jamnagar holds special place in our hearts and has a profound significance. Gujarat is where we come from, it's where Mukesh and his father built the refinery and I started my career by converting this arid and desert like area into a lush green township and a vibrant community." Watch: MS Dhoni, Sachin Tendulkar, Rohit Sharma reach Jamnagar for Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding celebrations | Off the field News - Times of IndiaEditionININUSSign InTOIsportsCricketIND VS ENGIPL 2024WPLFootballTennisBadmintonHockeyWeb StoriesVideosNFLNBARacingAthleticsWrestlingShootingBoxingChessToday's ePaperNewsSports NewsWatch: MS Dhoni, Sachin Tendulkar, Rohit Sharma reach Jamnagar for Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding celebrationsTrendingMS DhoniRCB vs MI Live ScoreMichael VaughanNew Zealand vs Australia Live ScoreAnjum ChopraShreyas IyerHardik PandyaKapil DevSourav GangulyIPL 2024MS DhoniRCB vs MI Live ScoreMichael VaughanNew Zealand vs Australia Live ScoreAnjum ChopraShreyas IyerHardik PandyaKapil DevSourav GangulyIPL 2024MS DhoniRCB vs MI Live ScoreMichael VaughanNew Zealand vs Australia Live ScoreAnjum ChopraShreyas IyerHardik PandyaKapil DevSourav GangulyIPL 2024Watch: MS Dhoni, Sachin Tendulkar, Rohit Sharma reach Jamnagar for Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding celebrationsTOI Sports Desk / TIMESOFINDIA.COM /  Mar 1, 2024, 17:23 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us Bollywood celebrities, cricketers, sports stars, heads of states and business tycoons from India and abroad, including Meta founder Mark Zuckerberg, arrived at Gujarat's Jamnagar city for a three-day-long lavish pre-wedding event of billionaire Mukesh Ambani's son Anant and his fiancee Radhika Merchant.  Mahendra Singh Dhoni with his wife Sakshi Dhoni (AFP photo) NEW DELHI: Legendary Sachin Tendulkar, talismanic MS Dhoni and India skipper Rohit Sharma were among the cricketing stars, who arrived in Jamnagar on Friday for the 3-day pre-wedding celebrations of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant.Anant, the youngest son of Reliance Chairman Mukesh Ambani, is set to tie the knot with industrialist Viren Merchant's daughter, Radhika, later this year.Nicknamed as 'God of Cricket', Sachin arrived with his wife Anjali Tendulkar and daughter Sara Tendulkar.Dhoni, who guided the Chennai Super Kings to their fifth Indian Premier League title last year, was accompanied by his wife Sakshi.India skipper Rohit along with his wife Ritika Sajdeh also arrived in Jamnagar for the pre-wedding festivities.Earlier in the day, India's white-ball star, Suryakumar Yadav, former cricketer Zaheer Khan and several sports personalities arrived in Jamnagar.Suryakumar has been playing for the Mumbai Indians since 2018 and has been a key player for the MI for a long time, playing a crucial role in the team.Afghanistan star spinner Rashid Khan also reached the city and was seen posing for the camera with India batter Suryakumar.Former India pacer Zaheer also reached Jamnagar with his wife, Sagarika Ghatge.India's dynamic opener Ishan Kishan, who recently missed out on the BCCI's annual player contracts list for 2023-2024, also reached Jamnagar to attend the festivities. The wicketkeeper-batter started his IPL career with five-time champions Mumbai Indians and since has been an integral part of the team.Former West Indies captain Dwayne Bravo also arrived in Jamnagar for the occasion. The Windies star played a crucial role in MI's success over the years.Ace shuttler Saina Nehwal and her husband and badminton player Parupalli Kashyap arrived in Jamnagar, for the pre-wedding celebrations.On Thursday, Pop sensation Rihanna, American singer and songwriter J Brown earlier arrived in Jamnagar. Not only, J Brown, but multi-instrumentalist, songwriter, producer, and bassist Adam Blackstone also reached Jamnagar.(With inputs from ANI)About the AuthorTOI Sports DeskThe TOI Sports Desk excels in a myriad of roles that capture the essence of live sporting events and deliver compelling content to readers worldwide. From running live blogs for India and non-India cricket matches to global spectacles featuring Indian talents, like the Chess World Cup final featuring Praggnanandhaa and the Badminton World Championships semifinal featuring HS Prannoy, our live coverage extends to all mega sporting events. We extensively cover events like the Olympics, Asian Games, Cricket World Cups, FIFA World Cups, and more. The desk is also adept at writing comprehensive match reports and insightful post-match commentary, complemented by stats-based articles that provide an in-depth analysis of player performances and team dynamics. We track news wires for key stories, conduct exclusive player interviews in both text and video formats, and file content from print editions and reporters. We keep track of all viral stories, trending topics and produce our own copies on the subjects. She brought a folding house as her cargo and had a playful exchange with a fan. The event will also feature Punjabi singer Diljit Dosanjh and magician David Blaine, who will mesmerize the guests.  On February 29, international pop star Rihanna landed in Jamnagar, Gujarat as she is all set to perform at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities. We have now got our hands on a video which gives us a sneak peek into the grand stage set for her electrifying performance. Watch the video here:        View this post on Instagram            A post shared by 🇬🇪🇧🇧 (@ramofenty) The singer had all eyes on her as she arrived in Jamnagar with her team and crew and heavy cargo that had to be rolled out of the airport.Sharing the video, a fan quipped, "What she bring with her? A folding house?" In a playful exchange on Instagram, Rihanna promptly addressed the cargo with a humorously light-hearted comment, "The stage couldn’t fit in my carryon."See More: Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding LIVE Updates: Ranveer and Deepika opt for classic black and white outfits for the occasionThe delightful exchange between the couple delighted fans, who praised her authenticity and commended her down-to-earth demeanor.Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding fiesta: Rihanna's 'Diamonds' rehearsal video takes internet by stormThe family of business magnates has pulled out all the stops to celebrate this special occasion with grandeur. According to a report from News18, globally renowned personalities such as Rihanna and Punjabi singer Diljit Dosanjh are slated to perform at the pre-wedding festivities. Further enhancing the allure, magician David Blaine is also scheduled to make an appearance and entertain the guests with his mesmerizing acts.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Beyond the breaking news, we present a celebration of culture.                                     fbsharetwsharepinshareComments (0)close01/10​10 Things to Know About Rihanna's Performance at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's Pre-Wedding CelebrationShop Similar LookAs the buzz surrounding the pre-wedding celebration of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant reaches a fever pitch, all eyes are on the star-studded guest list and the highly anticipated performance by none other than global icon Rihanna. Here are 10 things you need to know about Rihanna's upcoming performance at this lavish event:readmore02/10​Why is Rihanna in India?​Shop Similar LookRihanna's maiden trip to India was to perform at the pre-wedding celebrations of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant. The pop sensation has been invited to headline the musical event that is the highlight of the three-day extravaganza.readmore03/10First Performance After the Super BowlShop Similar LookRihanna's appearance at the pre-wedding celebration marks her first performance since her electrifying halftime show at the Super Bowl 2023. RiRi, who hasn't released new music since 2016, made a glamorous return to the big stage and attracted a record 121 million viewers, the highest-ever viewership for a Super Bowl show.readmore04/10When Will Rihanna Perform On-Stage?Shop Similar LookRihanna will reportedly hit the big stage tonight and enthral the guests with her chart-topping hits. The exact timing of her performance is yet to be disclosed, but going by the looks of the leaked videos, it is sure to be a night to remember. readmore05/10Love Songs on Rihanna's SetlistShop Similar LookKnown for her upbeat dance numbers and love ballads, Rihanna's setlist is expected to feature a mix of romantic some of her biggest hits including 'Diamonds'. In leaked videos from the rehearsals, it was confirmed that Rihanna will also be singing 'All of the Lights'. According to reports, some of the other songs that will feature on the setlist will include 'B***h Better Have My Money', 'Birthday Cake', 'Right Now', 'Wild Thoughts', 'Stay' and 'Love On The Brain', among other love anthems that will set the perfect mood for the occasion.readmore06/10What is Rihanna's Fee for the Private Show?Shop Similar LookRihanna, a self-made billionaire, charges a huge fee for her private shows and this one is rumoured to be exorbitant. Reports indicate that the singer received a staggering $5 million for her exclusive performance at the private celebrations. readmore07/10BYOS - Bring Your Own StageShop Similar LookRihanna's larger-than-life performance demands nothing short of a grand stage, prompting the singer to allegedly get along her own stage props for the show. On her arrival in Jamnagar, paparazzi filmed huge 10-foot crates being rolled away from the airport, believed to have the star's equipment and props for the show. When a fan asked, "What she bring with her? A folding house?" the singer took to the comments to reply, ""The stage couldn’t fit in my carryon."readmore08/10Rihanna to Dress in Traditional Indian AttireShop Similar LookIn a nod to the cultural significance of the grant event, Rihanna is expected to dazzle in some elaborate Manish Malhotra creations. According to reports, all celebrity guests, including foreign delegates will be dressed in designer outfits for the three-day event. readmore09/10Rihanna's Return to Music Shop Similar LookRihanna's performance at the pre-wedding celebration marks a significant milestone in her music comeback journey. After a hiatus, she made her highly anticipated return to music with the release of 'Life Me Up' in October 2022, the Oscar-nominated original soundtrack for the Marvel superhero film 'Black Panther: Wakanda Forever'. readmore10/10Rihanna's Last On-Stage PerformanceShop Similar LookExactly a year ago, Rihanna took to the Oscar stage to perform her song 'Lift Me Up' which was among the tracks nominated for Best Song. She, however, lost the award to the 'RRR' song 'Naatu Naatu'. readmore

Deepika Padukone's Impeccable Style at Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's Pre-wedding Festivities | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomelifestylerelationshiphealth & fitnessstylevisual storiestrendingparentingthe artssoul searchbeautybooksrecipesfood newstravelhome & gardeneventsspotlightvideosceleb stylestyle guidebuzzdesignersshowstimes luxuryvideosdesigner directoryNewslifestylefashionceleb-style​Let's 'bow' down to mummy Deepika Padukone for her impeccable style at Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivitiesTrendingAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownOptical IllusionBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone RoutineAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownOptical IllusionBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone RoutineAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownOptical IllusionBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone Routine​Let's 'bow' down to mummy Deepika Padukone for her impeccable style at Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivitiesTOI Lifestyle Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Mar 1, 2024, 23:45 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh arrived in Jamnagar to join the extravagant pre-wedding celebrations of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant. The star-studded event included Bollywood and international celebrities, with Rihanna delivering a spectacular performance. The couple's snapshots showcased their elegance and affection.  Celebrity power couple Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh, who recently delighted fans with the news of their pregnancy, made a glamorous arrival in Jamnagar on Thursday to join in the extravagant pre-wedding celebrations of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant. Taking to his Instagram on Friday, Ranveer shared heartwarming snapshots of the couple, capturing their radiant spirits as they embraced the evening's elegant cocktail dress code.In the photos, Ranveer and Deepika are seen sharing affectionate glances, radiating joy in each other's company.Ranveer opted for a stylish all-white suit, complemented by sleek shades, while Deepika stunned in a timeless black vintage dress from renowned designer duo Gauri and Nainika. With minimal accessories and a charming bow adorning her hairstyle, Deepika epitomized elegance and grace. Ranveer showered the post with multiple heart emoticons, tagging Deepika in a display of love and admiration.Deepika later took to her Instagram stories, offering a closer look at her enchanting outfit, providing fans with a detailed glimpse of her impeccable style. The couple recently announced their pregnancy on social media, sharing their joy as they anticipate the arrival of their baby in September 2024.The star-studded guest list for the grand festivities in Gujarat includes the crème de la crème of Bollywood. Earlier today, a parade of celebrities including Ananya Panday, Shanaya Kapoor, Aditya Roy Kapur, Shraddha Kapoor, Kareena Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan, and many others were spotted arriving at Jamnagar airport. Boarding a volvo bus, the stars made their way to the venue, setting the stage for an unforgettable night of celebrations.Rani Mukerji, Deepika-Ranveer arrive for Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant pre-weddingIn addition to Bollywood luminaries, international celebrities like Rihanna and David Blaine are gracing the pre-wedding festivities with their presence. According to the viral itinerary, Rihanna is slated to take the stage today, promising a spectacular performance that will undoubtedly elevate the evening to new heights of excitement and glamour.About the AuthorTOI Lifestyle DeskThe TOI Lifestyle Desk is a dynamic team of dedicated journalists who, with unwavering passion and commitment, sift through the pulse of the nation to curate a vibrant tapestry of lifestyle news for The Times of India readers. Isha Ambani 3D Gown: Isha Ambani stuns in a 3D gown at Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding ceremony | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomelifestylerelationshiphealth & fitnessstylevisual storiestrendingparentingthe artssoul searchbeautybooksrecipesfood newstravelhome & gardeneventsspotlightvideosceleb stylestyle guidebuzzdesignersshowstimes luxuryvideosdesigner directoryNewslifestylefashionceleb-styleIsha Ambani stuns in a 3D gown at Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding ceremonyTrendingAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownManish MalhotraBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone RoutineAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownManish MalhotraBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone RoutineAnant Ambani Pre Wedding SpeechDeepika PadukoneIsha Ambani 3D GownManish MalhotraBaby NamesHuman Behaviour BooksDeepika Padukone RoutineIsha Ambani stuns in a 3D gown at Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding ceremonyTOI Lifestyle Desk / etimes.in /  Mar 1, 2024, 22:38 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us Isha Ambani graced the pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant with her signature elegance and style. Adorning a mesmerizing couture gown crafted by Miss Sohee, Isha embodied timeless grace in every aspect of her attire.  Isha Ambani graced the pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant with her signature elegance and style. Adorning a mesmerizing couture gown crafted by Miss Sohee, Isha embodied timeless grace in every aspect of her attire. The gown, a true masterpiece of artistry, featured intricate 3D embroidery, with cherry blossoms and Magnolia flower branches intertwining with majestic peacock motifs embellished in Swarovski crystals.Paired with a sculptural shawl inspired by delicate petals, Isha's ensemble exuded opulence and sophistication, elevating her presence to regal heights.Captured against a backdrop of picturesque florals, Isha's enchanting fashion moment was shared by celebrity stylist Anaita Shroff Adajania on Instagram. Anaita, the creative mind behind Isha's custom couture look, seamlessly blended the charm of Isha's personality with a tribute to timeless elegance. Isha's minimal yet flawless hair and makeup, expertly crafted by Yianni Tsapatori and Tanvi Chemburkar respectively, complemented her ethereal ensemble, adding the perfect finishing touches to her ensemble.The ongoing pre-wedding festivities, hosted in Jamnagar, Gujarat, for Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant, have drawn the attendance of a star-studded guest list from across the globe. Celebrities such as Mark Zuckerberg, Bill Gates, Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh, Alia Bhatt, and many others have graced the occasion, adding to the grandeur of the celebrations. The itinerary for the first day of festivities promises a spectacular lineup of events, including the awe-inspiring Cirque De Soleil performances, the captivating Vantara Show showcasing the beauty of the animal kingdom, and a mesmerizing drone show illuminating the night sky.Anant Ambani, Radhika Merchant pre-wedding bash: Rihanna's team lands in Jamnagar. Watch videoThe evening will culminate with a special performance by the renowned singer Rihanna, marking her debut performance in India. Guests will be treated to her popular tracks, setting the stage for a magical evening of music and celebration. The festivities will conclude with a lavish dinner and after-party, ensuring a perfect end to an enchanting day filled with unforgettable moments.About the AuthorTOI Lifestyle DeskThe TOI Lifestyle Desk is a dynamic team of dedicated journalists who, with unwavering passion and commitment, sift through the pulse of the nation to curate a vibrant tapestry of lifestyle news for The Times of India readers. At the TOI Lifestyle Desk, we go beyond the obvious, delving into the extraordinary. Consider us your lifestyle companion, providing a daily dose of inspiration and information. Guests receive handwritten letters from Ambanis and Merchants at Anant-Radhika's pre-wedding celebrations - See photo | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodGuests receive handwritten letters from Ambanis and Merchants at Anant-Radhika's pre-wedding celebrations - See photoTrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerGuests receive handwritten letters from Ambanis and Merchants at Anant-Radhika's pre-wedding celebrations - See photoTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Mar 1, 2024, 23:44 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities in Jamnagar are filled with VIPs, including Bollywood and international celebrities. Special handwritten letters by Radhika, Anant, and their parents Nita Ambani, Mukesh Ambani, Shaila Merchant, and Viren Merchant have gone viral, containing messages encouraging guests to enjoy every moment and refrain from taking pictures at animal sites for safety.  Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities are in full swing in Jamnagar, with a guest list brimming with VIPs, including Bollywood and international celebrities, sports icons, and successful business moguls.We've now got our hands on special handwritten letters penned by Radhika, Anant, and their parents Nita Ambani, Mukesh Ambani, as well as Shaila Merchant and Viren Merchant, addressed to the guests.Check out the photo here:The handwritten letters by Radhika Merchant, Anant Ambani, Nita Ambani, Mukesh Ambani, Shaila Merchant, and Viren Merchant for the guests have gone viral. These letters contain special messages encouraging guests to enjoy every moment to the fullest. Additionally, they request guests to refrain from taking pictures at animal sites to ensure safety.See More: Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding LIVE Updates: Aamir Khan sends his blessings to the soon-to-be married coupleRadhika and Anant's letter reads, "Thank you for joining us for our pre-wedding festivities and making this start to our lives all the more special. These moments that we will share together are deeply precious to us. We are happy for you to take photographs at the events but do enjoy each moment to its fullest. Our event photographers will cover the celebrations comprehensively and we will make sure to share your photos with you after the events. However, we do have a small request. Please refrain from taking photos or videos around the animals. Photography is restricted at all animal sites to ensure human and animal safety. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. We can't wait to celebrate with you and create memories for a lifetime. With lots of love, Radhika & Anant."Cuteness alert! Mukesh Ambani and wife Nita groove to 'Pyaar Hua Iqraar Hua Hai'; netizens react"We are overjoyed to have you join us at our home in Jamnagar, for Radhika and Anant's pre-wedding celebrations. Over the next three days, we hope to share with you a sense of adventure, wonder, and joy! As Radhika and Anant begin their journey together, your presence and blessings mean the world to them and us. For your convenience, we have attached a detailed itinerary and a guest handbook. Our team is at your service 24x7. To ensure that your stay in Jamnagar is pleasant and comfortable. Please reach out to them for any assistance and support. We look forward to share unforgettable moments with you, surrounded by the laughter of friends, the love of family, the blessings of elders, and the wonders of nature. With love and best wishes. Nita & Mukesh Ambani, Shaila & Viren Merchant."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Sources close to the couple suggest that they are in a happy and steady relationship.  Shraddha Kapoor, along with her rumoured boyfriend Rahul Mody, has touched down in Jamnagar to take part in the pre-wedding celebrations of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant. The duo was spotted at a private terminal in Mumbai before boarding their flight to Gujarat. Shraddha and Rahul opted for coordinated outfits in white and blue denim. They captured the attention of onlookers and paparazzi alike as they walked together.In the paparazzi videos, Shraddha and Rahul were spotted arriving at the event venue, which has fueled speculation about their relationship status. According to India Today, sources close to the couple suggest that they are in a happy and steady relationship.#CelebrityEvenings: From Shraddha Kapoor to Shilpa Shetty, Bollywood celebs spotted in MumbaiShraddha has remained tight-lipped about her personal life and always chosen to keep previous relationships under wraps. According to the insider, Shraddha's public appearance with Rahul can be considered as their official joint appearance as a couple. While Shraddha has neither confirmed nor denied her romance with Rahul, their joint presence at the festivities speaks volumes, leaving fans curious about the blossoming relationship.Meanwhile, who's who from different fields has arrived to attend the lavish celebrations. Eminent personalities like Ivanka Trump, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg, cricketer Mahendra Singh Dhoni, his wife Sakshi Dhoni, superstar Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan, Akshay Kumar, Saif Ali Khan and family, among others, graced the mega event.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Rihanna's fee for performing at Anant Ambani's pre-wedding bash will blow your mind!Mar 01, 2024, 11:33PM ISTSource: etimes.inAnant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities kicked off in Jamnagar on March 1. According to reports, pop icon Rihanna, who is a touring artist and rarely does private gigs, will reportedly perform at the event for which Ambanis has shelled out a whopping amount. Yes. The singer's fee for the performance is reportedly to be somewhere between $8-$9 million (Rs 66 to 74 crore). The buzz is that Rihanna is doing a big set which includes a medley of her songs and also solo hits like 'Diamonds'. Apart from Rihanna, Diljit Dosanjh is expected to perform for the guests at the grand event. For more news and updates, stay tuned to ETimes. Dad-to-be Ranveer Singh dances in joy as he reaches Jamnagar with Deepika Padukone for Anant Ambani, Radhika Merchant pre-wedding festivities, netizens react | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodDad-to-be Ranveer Singh dances with joy as he reaches Jamnagar with Deepika Padukone for Anant Ambani, Radhika Merchant pre-wedding festivities, netizens reactTrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDad-to-be Ranveer Singh dances with joy as he reaches Jamnagar with Deepika Padukone for Anant Ambani, Radhika Merchant pre-wedding festivities, netizens reactTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Mar 1, 2024, 08:50 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us Ranveer Singh looked elated as he danced with joy him and Deepika Padukone reached Jamnagar airport which was packed with fans for the pre-wedding festivities of the Ambanis!  Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone left their fans and well wishers all excited as the duo announced that they're expected their first child. The couple made this announcement the day they were supposed to make an appearance together as they jetted off from Mumbai to Jamnagar from Anant Ambani, Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities! Ranveer and DP were twinning in white at the Mumbai airport and got a grand welcome by the paps in Mumbai with flowers and chocolates! Meanwhile, the couple was welcomed in Jamnagar with more frenzy.There was a huge crowd which gathered to see them.There was also loud music as Ranveer and DP arrived at the airport! The energetic, emotional person that Singh is, he was elated and was even seen dancing as they reached Jamnagar and got a grand welcome. Ranveer was also very protective about his lady love amidst the crowds. Here's how fans reacted seeing Ranveer dance. A user said, "Look how proud he is 😅😅" while another one said, "They’re gonna be great parents ❤"Many fans dropped hearts.Ranveer and DP confirmed the pregnancy yesterday and announced that the baby is expected in September 2024. On work front, both of them will be seen in Rohit Shetty's 'Singham Again'. Deepika will be seen playing a cop in the movie. Meanwhile, the actress also has 'Project K' lined up. A few days ago, amidst rumours of pregnancy, there were reports that Deepika has backed out of 'White Lotus 3' and that had further sparked the baby news. Well, now it's confirmed!About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India.
