This is Rihanna's fee for performing at Anant Ambani's pre-wedding bash - India Today India TodayNortheastMalayalamBusiness TodayBT BazaarAaj TakLallantopBanglaGNTTViChowkReader’s DigestSports TakCrime TakAstro TakGamingHarper's BazaarBrides TodayCosmopolitanIshq FMAaj Tak CampusKisan TakIndia Today HindiIndia TodayNortheastMalayalamBusiness TodayBT BazaarAaj TakLallantopBanglaGNTTViChowkReader’s DigestMagazineLive TVSearchSEARCHSIGN INDark ModeEdition ININUSHome TVLive TVPrimetimeMagazineLatest EditionInsightLife+StyleIndiaSouthWorldBusinessTechnologyEntertainmentShowbuzzBollywoodHollywoodOTTLatest ReviewsSports SpecialsPodcastsSunday SpecialHistory of ItNewsMoDIUInteractivesOpinionGamesVideosFact Check Other NewsScienceEducationHealthIt's ViralLaw TodayAutoEnvironmentCitiesHoroscopesWeatherFollow Us On:   NewsMusicThis is Rihanna's fee for performing at Anant Ambani's pre-wedding bashThis is Rihanna's fee for performing at Anant Ambani's pre-wedding bashRihanna will reportedly perform today, March 1, at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding event in Jamnagar. We give you a scoop of how much she is getting paid for her performance. Listen to StoryLive TVShareAdvertisementRihanna will perform at the Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's wedding in Jamnagar.Tushar JoshiMumbai,UPDATED: Mar 1, 2024 13:39 ISTIn ShortRihanna will perform at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivitiesThe singer is reportedly getting paid a whopping amount of over Rs 50 crore for her perfomanceHer performance is expected to begin at 5.30 today, March 1Pop icon Rihanna, who is a touring artist and rarely does private gigs, is getting paid a whopping amount for the Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant pre-wedding festivities. Sources tell India Today that her fee for the performance is somewhere between $8-$9 million (Rs 66 to 74 crore). The festivities kickstart from today, March 1, with an event titled 'An evening in Everland'. advertisementThe singer arrived in Gujarat's Jamnagar on Febraury 29 along with her troupe. She was seen making her way out of the airport and was papped by the photographers.The buzz is that Rihanna is doing a big set which includes a medley of her songs and also solo hits like 'Diamonds'. Apparently, most of the cost for her gig went into transporting her stage equipment, outfit changes for her and the background singers.Rihanna’s last performance was at the 2023 Super Bowl half-time show, which drew close to 121.017 million viewers, making it one of the most-watched Super Bowl show events.Also, she is not the first international musician to perform at an Ambani wedding. In 2018, Beyoncé performed at Isha Ambani and Anand Piramal’s sangeet and was rumoured to be paid close to $4 million (Rs 33 crore).Apart from Rihanna, Diljit Dosanjh is expected to perform for the guests at the grand event. Another major highlight of the pre-wedding will be world-renowned illunionsit David Blaine's act. Celebrities including Shah Rukh Khan and his family, Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh, Alia Bhatt, Ranbir, Arjun Kapoor, 'Jawan' director Atlee and his family, among others have arrived at Jamnagar for the biggest wedding of the year.Published By: K JananiPublished On: Mar 1, 2024Tune InALSO READ  |  Video: Rihanna arrives in Jamnagar ahead of Anant Ambani’s pre-wedding bashTrending Reel

One of her fan pages on Instagram provided a 'sneak peek' into Rihanna's stage and rehearsal, accompanied by a caption detailing the songs she might perform for the Ambanis on March 1. The caption read, 'Rihanna rehearsing 'Diamonds' and 'All Of The Lights' for her upcoming performance at Anant Ambani & Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding.' Rihanna arrived in India on March 1 and is expected to give a performance for the Ambanis later in the evening. Anant-Radhika's pre-wedding festivities will span three days, from March 1 to 3, at the Ambani Estate in Jamnagar. Mukesh Ambani invited prominent personalities worldwide, including Rihanna, Mark Zuckerberg, and Bill Gates. Celebrities like Shah Rukh Khan, Ranbir Kapoor, and Alia Bhatt also attended, with Rihanna showcasing her casual yet chic fashion sense.  The pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant have commenced in Jamnagar, Gujarat. Mukesh Ambani extended invitations to prominent personalities worldwide for his youngest son's wedding celebration, showcasing the beauty of India nestled in Jamnagar. Following Rihanna and Mark Zuckerberg, Bill Gates also made a starry appearance at the airport.Check out his photos here:On March 1, 2024, Bill Gates graced the pre-wedding festivities with his presence. Upon his arrival at the Jamnagar airport, paparazzi rushed to capture his pictures, to which the former CEO of Microsoft gladly posed. Gates received a warm welcome at the airport before departing for the hotel in a cab adorned with animal art.See More: Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding LIVE Updates: Mukesh and Nita Ambani perform on 'Pyaar Hua Iqraar Hua'On February 29, 2024, the Jamnagar airport transformed into a red carpet affair as numerous celebrities, including Shah Rukh Khan and his family, Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt with their daughter, Raha Kapoor, and Rihanna, graced the event. Adding to the star-studded lineup was Mark Zuckerberg, the CEO of Facebook, who arrived with his wife, Priscilla Chan. The couple sported casual ensembles for the occasion. Upon their arrival, they were welcomed with traditional flower garlands and Gujarati stoles.Bill Gates Dons Indian Vibe For Anant Ambani, Radhika Merchant's Pre-Wedding BashOn February 29, 2024, Rihanna was captured by paparazzi at the Jamnagar airport. The superstar singer exuded her signature classy style, donning a fitted top paired with baggy jeans, showcasing her casual yet chic fashion sense. She happily posed for the paparazzi upon reaching the destination for the pre-wedding festivities of Radhika Merchant and Anant Ambani.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Anant Ambani's first look revealed as pre-wedding festivities kick off in Jamnagar | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodAnant Ambani's first look revealed as pre-wedding festivities kick off in JamnagarTrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerAnant Ambani's first look revealed as pre-wedding festivities kick off in JamnagarTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Mar 1, 2024, 22:56 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us Reliance Industries Chairman Mukesh Ambani's youngest son, Anant Ambani, is set to tie the knot with industrialist Viren Merchant's daughter, Radhika Merchant on March 3. The three-day pre-wedding bash began on Friday evening in Gujarat's Jamnagar. Amidst the celebrations, the eagerly awaited first look of the groom has finally been unveiled.  Reliance Industries Chairman Mukesh Ambani's youngest son, Anant Ambani, is set to tie the knot with industrialist Viren Merchant's daughter, Radhika Merchant on March 3. The three-day pre-wedding bash began on Friday evening in Gujarat's Jamnagar. Amidst the celebrations, the eagerly awaited first look of the groom has finally been unveiled. Opting for a timeless and traditional ensemble, Anant Ambani exuded grace and sophistication in a Peach Coloured Kurta paired with Churidar and a complementing Nehru Jacket.The simplicity of his attire resonated with traditional charm, reflecting his penchant for classic elegance.The unveiling of Anant's first look was made by Bharat J Mehra, a respected social worker and the Chairman of Radha Meera Trust supported by the Ajay Piramal Group. Mehra is known for his philanthropic endeavors and close ties with the Ambani family.The events on Day 1 kicked off at 5.30 pm, with 'An Evening in Everland at the Conservatory', which will have 'Elegant Cocktail' as the dress code for the guests, followed by welcome speeches by the family.Cuteness alert! Mukesh Ambani and wife Nita groove to 'Pyaar Hua Iqraar Hua Hai'; netizens reactIt will be followed by 'Cirque De Soleil', which is being described as "a spectacle of extraordinary performances", followed by 'Vantara Show' which is being described as "Marvel at the beauty of the Animal kingdom".See More: Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding LIVE Updates: Ranveer and Deepika opt for classic black and white outfits for the occasionPost the Vantara Show, the grand pre-wedding festivities will feature a special 'Drone Show', about which an official release stated "watch the sky come alive with a never seen before dazzling display".Followed by a special performance by pop sensation Rihanna. The picture described the performance as "Join the Euphoria as Rihanna performs in India for the first time."Day 1 will end with Dinner and an Afterparty, "a perfect end to a magical evening."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding celebrations commenced today in Gujarat's Jamnagar and will continue till March 3.The off-shoulder sheer gown that Isha wore was designed by London-based fashion designer Miss Sohee. It featured floral motifs all over. What set the gown apart was a satin train attached to it. advertisementIsha accessorised her look with a regal neckpiece and earrings. She tied her hair into a neat bun and kept her makeup subtle with eyeliner, blush and lipstick.This is Isha's first look for Anant and Radhika's pre-wedding festivities. See Isha Ambani's pictures here:

In the meantime, Isha also posed with designer Manish Malhotra in a separate outfit, in a subtle shade of green.

The couple has invited 1,000 guests, including Indian celebrities, sportspersons and industrialists. Global personalities such as Bill Gates and Mark Zuckerberg will also attend. Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant pre-wedding ceremony: Nita Ambani reveals her two wishes for the couple | - Times of India Sign InTOIhomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officepreviewsdid you knowvideosblogsshowtimesawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant pre-wedding ceremony: Nita Ambani REVEALS her two wishes for the coupleTrendingDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerDeepika Padukone Baby NewsAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre WeddingRanveer SinghShreyas TalpadeAlia BhattShah Rukh KhanRadhika Merchant Pre Wedding Gust ListKarisma KapoorRanveer SinghAbraham OzlerAnant Ambani-Radhika Merchant pre-wedding ceremony: Nita Ambani REVEALS her two wishes for the coupleTOI Entertainment Desk /  Mar 1, 2024, 13:28 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us Amidst all this, Nita Ambani, Anant's mother, recently shared her wish for the couple, who will tie the knot later this year. In a video by ANI, the proud mum revealed her two wishes for the lovely couple. She said, "When it came to my youngest son Anant's wedding with Radhika, I had two important wishes - first, I wanted to celebrate our roots.”  A bevy of stars from across the world have descended to Jamnagar, Gujarat, to attend Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding extravaganza from today to March 3. The three-day-affair will be marked by theme based events, musical performances and much more.Amidst all this, Nita Ambani, Anant's mother, recently shared her wish for the couple, who will tie the knot later this year.In a video by ANI, the proud mum revealed her two wishes for the lovely couple. She said, "When it came to my youngest son Anant's wedding with Radhika, I had two important wishes - first, I wanted to celebrate our roots.”Emphasizing the significance of the pre-wedding locale, Nita Ambani expanded on the importance of Jamnagar, stating that the city holds a profound significance in their hearts as it represents their roots. Gujarat, their native state, is where her husband Mukesh Ambani and his father established the refinery, and where she commenced her career by metamorphosing the barren terrain into a verdant township and a thriving community.Nita Ambani revealed her second wish saying, “Second, I wanted the celebration to be a tribute to our arts and culture and a reflection of our heritage and culture.”You can take a look at the video here...Meanwhile, renowned global music icon Rihanna has taken the helm to curate an exclusive playlist for the pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant, scheduled to unfold in Jamnagar, Gujarat from today. These eagerly awaited celebrations promise to blend cultural richness with contemporary flair, and Rihanna's specially selected tracks are poised to infuse the events with unparalleled vibrancy.Known for her distinctive taste and trendsetting style, Rihanna has meticulously assembled a playlist designed to enthrall attendees and cultivate an unforgettable atmosphere throughout the festivities. Spanning from soulful ballads to energetic anthems, the playlist reflects the diverse musical palette that has solidified Rihanna's status as a global sensation. With Rihanna's curated playlist taking center stage, the pre-wedding ceremonies are primed to deliver an experience nothing short of extraordinary.On the other hand, many stars have descended to Jamnagar for the festivities, out of which Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone caught everyone's eye. The duo left their fans and well wishers all excited, as the duo announced that they're expecting their first child. The couple made this announcement the day they were supposed to make an appearance together as they jetted off from Mumbai to Jamnagar from Anant Ambani, Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities! Ranveer and DP were twinning in white at the Mumbai airport and got a grand welcome by the paps in Mumbai with flowers and chocolates! Meanwhile, the couple was welcomed in Jamnagar with more frenzy. There was a huge crowd which gathered to see them.About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape.                                    fbsharetwsharepinshareComments (0)Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant’s relationship timelineetimes.in | Last updated on - Feb 29, 2024, 19:08 ISTShare 
                                    fbsharetwsharepinshareComments (0)close01/7Anant Ambani and Radhika MerchantShop Similar LookIndia's richest person and Chairman and Managing Director of Reliance Industries, Mukesh Ambani and his wife Nita Ambani's youngest son Anant Ambani will get married to his fiance Radhika Merchant on July 12, 2024. Ahead of their wedding, the Ambanis are hosting a grand pre-wedding celebration in Jamnagar from March 1 to 3 where the who's who from business, tech, celebrity and Bollywood would be seen. So, let's take a look at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's relationship timeline here. by TOI Lifestyle Deskreadmore02/7Radhika Merchant: From friends to partnersShop Similar LookRadhika Merchant is the younger daughter of Encore Healthcare Private Limited's CEO Viren Merchant and his wife Shaila Merchant. According to a press release shard by the Ambanis at the time of her Roka with Anant Ambani in 2022, the couple knew each other for a few years before getting engaged.Radhika's pictures with Anant Ambani first appeared online in 2018, which lead to the specualtions of them being a couple. From December 2018 to March 2019, Radhika was seen attending Anant's elder siblings-- Akash Ambani and Isha Ambani's weddings. Radhika was seen taking part in the family rituals which shows how close she was to the Ambanis back then.readmore03/7Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's rokaShop Similar LookAfter knowing each other for a few years, Anant and Radhika's roka ceremony was held in 2022. It was performed at the Shrinathji Temple at NathDwara, Rajasthan in the presence of their family and friends. “Anant and Radhika have known each other for a few years and today’s ceremony commences the formal journey of their marriage in the coming months. Both families seek the blessings and good wishes of everyone for Radhika and Anant as they start their journey of togetherness,” their families had said in a statement after their roka.readmore04/7How Nita Ambani welcomed Radhika Merchant in the Ambani householdShop Similar LookTheir a grand engagement ceremony in January 2023, also called the 'Gol Dhana' ceremony. In this festivity, Nita Ambani performed Radhika's aarti at the entrance of her Mumbai home, Antilia, amidst the chanting of mantras and blowing of conch shells. Radhika then bowed to and did a namaste to her to-be in-laws, who hugged her in return-- this symbolised her formal welcome into the Ambani household. This was followed by traditional rituals for their official engagement.'Gol Dhana' literally translates to jaggery and coriander seeds, which are distributed to friends and family thus symbolising the engagement of a couple.readmore05/7Nita Ambani hosts Radhika Merchant's ‘Arangetram’ ceremony Shop Similar LookAfter Anant and Radhika's roka in 2022, Mukesh and Nita Ambani hosted her ‘Arangetram’ ceremony in June 2022 at the Jio World Centre in Mumbai. Radhika is also a trained Bharatanatyam dancer, and her ‘Arangetram’ ceremony was attended by Bollywood ceelebrities including Salman Khan, Aamir Khan, among others.readmore06/7Anant-Radhika: Partners for lifeShop Similar LookSince their roka and engagement ceremonies, Radhika has often been spotted with the Ambanis, visiting many temples across the country. For instance, in September 2022, Radhika visited Kerala's Guruvayur temple with her to-bee father-in-law Mukesh Ambani. After a month, Anant Ambani was spotted attending the aarti at the popular Shirdi Sai Temple. In April 2023, Anant and Radhika also attended the opening ceremony of the Nita Mukesh Ambani Cultural Centre (NMACC) in Mumbai. More recently, Radhika was seen along with the Ambanis at Ayodhya's Ram Temple's consecration ceremony.readmore07/7Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding celebrationsShop Similar LookAfter their ‘Lagan Lakhvanu’ ceremony on January 16 in Jamnagar, Anant and Radhika's pre-wedding festivities will also take place there from March 1 to 3, 2024. From Rihanna performing for the audience, to business and tech giants like Bill Gates and Mark Zuckerberg, and Bollywood and other celebrities attending the bash-- it is going to be a star-studded event.readmore

Listen to StoryLive TVShareAdvertisementRihanna arrives in Jamnagar ahead of Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities.India Today Entertainment DeskNew Delhi,UPDATED: Feb 29, 2024 19:29 ISTIn ShortRihanna has arrived in Jamnagar ahead of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivitiesA video of the singer at the venue has gone viralThe star-studded three-day event will begin from March 1Pop icon Rihanna has arrived in Jamnagar, Gujarat, to participate in the pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant. The grand three-day affair is scheduled to commence from March 1 in Gujarat, promising a star-studded extravaganza. A video capturing the singer's arrival at the venue has surfaced online.Rihanna is one of the many prominent artists who will be performing at the function. Arijit Singh, Diljit Dosanjh are also a part of the extensive lineup of musicians who will enthrall the guests with their performances at the grand event. advertisementA video of Rihanna arriving at the venue in Jamnagar has gone viral. The clip featured the singer making her way outside the airport as she sat in the cart. Watch the video here:
Earlier, sources had confirmed that pop queen Rihanna will perform at the pre-wedding bash on March 2. Other than the performances, another highlight will be world-renowned Illusionist David Blaine’s act.Most notable Indian leaders from the business, sports and entertainment circuit will be seen attending the pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant.Expect elaborate decorations, music, dance performances, and delicious cuisine, reflecting the rich cultural heritage and grandeur of India. The celebrations will also provide guests with an experience of the nature conservation done over the last few decades at Jamnagar. Not just that, they will also experience the animal rescue and rehabilitation work being carried out in Jamnagar under Anant Ambani's leadership.Published By: Prachi aryaPublished On: Feb 29, 2024Tune InALSO READ  |  Video: Rihanna's team arrives in Jamnagar for Anant Ambani's pre-wedding functionsTrending Reel

Listen to StoryLive TVShareAdvertisementAnant Ambani and Radhika Merchant served food at Jogwad village near Reliance Township in Jamnagar. (Picture: India Today)India Today News DeskJamnagar,UPDATED: Feb 29, 2024 10:49 ISTEdited By: Ashutosh AcharyaIn ShortAnant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding festivities begin in JamnagarFood was served to 51 thousand people in Jogwad as part of eventMukesh Ambani, Anant, Radhika and other family members serve food to villagersThe pre-wedding festivities of the youngest heir of Reliance Industries Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant began with 'Anna Seva' at Jogwad village near Reliance Township in Jamnagar in Gujarat.As part of the 'Anna Seva', food was served to about 51 thousand people of the village.Keeping with their family tradition, Reliance Industries Chairman and Managing Director Mukesh Ambani, Anant Ambani, and other members of the family, including Radhika served Gujarati food to the villagers. This would continue for the next few days.advertisementRadhika's maternal grandmother and parents, Viren and Shaila Merchant, also took part in the 'Anna Seva' event.After the 'Anna Seva', the attendees were invited to be a part of a folk music performance by singer Kirtidan Gadhvi.Anant and Radhika will host close to 1,000 guests for three days at the Reliance Greens Complex in Jamnagar as part of their pre-wedding festivities.On being asked why he chose Jamnagar for the pre-wedding events, Anant said that he was inspired by Prime Minister Narendra Modi's 'Wed in India' call.In a conversation with India Today's News Director Rahul Kanwal on the special episode of 'Jab We Met', Anant also said that he chose Jamnagar as it is his grandmother's birthplace, and the town where his grandfather Dhirubhai Ambani and father Mukesh Ambani started their business.Published By: Ashutosh AcharyaPublished On: Feb 29, 2024ALSO READ |  Friends or competitors? Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Pre Wedding Celebrations: Alia Bhatt, Raha, Ranbir Kapoor, Salman Khan and global artists hit Jamnagar for Anant-Radhika’s pre-wedding bash | Etimes - Times of India Videos Sign InTOIhomeVideosMoviesMusicTVWeb Series TrailersLifestylePageantsEventsKidsTrendingAnant AmbaniDeepika Padukone PregnancyAnant Ambani Pre Wedding CelebrationVicky KaushalJustin BieberRihannaAnil AmbaniLaapataa Ladies ReviewRaj KundraAnant AmbaniDeepika Padukone PregnancyAnant Ambani Pre Wedding CelebrationVicky KaushalJustin BieberRihannaAnil AmbaniLaapataa Ladies ReviewRaj KundraAnant AmbaniDeepika Padukone PregnancyAnant Ambani Pre Wedding CelebrationVicky KaushalJustin BieberRihannaAnil AmbaniLaapataa Ladies ReviewRaj KundraEtimesVideosEtimesBollywoodAlia Bhatt, Raha, Ranbir Kapoor, Salman Khan and global artists hit Jamnagar for Anant-Radhika’s pre-wedding bash!1631 views2 days agoAlia Bhatt, Raha, Ranbir Kapoor, Salman Khan and global artists hit Jamnagar for Anant-Radhika’s pre-wedding bash!Feb 29, 2024, 12:53PM ISTSource: etimes.inAlia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor, and their charming daughter Raha were recently photographed at the airport en route to Jamnagar for Anant-Radhika’s pre-wedding celebration. Bollywood stars like Arjun Kapoor and Salman Khan have also arrived in Jamnagar. International artists J Brown and Adam Blackstone were seen at Jamnagar airport, along with Rihanna's team arriving in Gujarat for the festivities. The pre-wedding events for Anant and Radhika will unfold over three days, from March 1 to 3, at the Ambani Estate in Jamnagar.
